reference: Mandag offentliggjorde forskere fra Stanford Universitys School of Medicine opfindelsen af et nyt diagnoseværktøj, som kan sortere celler efter type: en ganske lille printbar chip, som kan fremstilles med almindelige inkjetprintere, muligvis for omkring én US-cent stykket.
source: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.

reference: Førende forskere siger, at dette kan medføre tidlig opdagelse af kræft, tuberkulose, HIV og malaria for patienter i lavindkomstlande, hvor overlevelsesraterne for sygdomme, såsom brystkræft, kan være halvdelen af dem fra rigere lande.
source: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

reference: JAS 39C Gripen styrtede ned på en landingsbane omkring kl. 9.30 lokal tid (02.30 UTC) og eksploderede, hvilket førte til midlertidig lukning af lufthavnen for kommercielle flyvninger.
source: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.

reference: Piloten blev identificeret som eskadrilleleder Dilokrit Pattavee.
source: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.

reference: Lokale medier rapporterer, at en brandbil fra lufthavnen væltede, mens den var under udrykning.
source: Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

reference: Den 28-årige Vidal har sluttet sig til Barca for tre sæsoner siden fra Sevilla.
source: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla.

reference: Vidal har, siden han flyttede til den catalanske hovedstad, spillet 49 kampe for klubben.
source: Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.

reference: Protesten startede omkring kl. 11:00 lokal tid (UTC+1) på Whitehall, overfor den politibevogtede indgang til Downing Street, premierministerens officielle hjem.
source: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.

reference: Lidt over kl. 11:00 blokerede demonstranter den nordgående trafik i Whitehall.
source: Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall.

reference: Klokken 11:20 bad politiet demonstranterne om at bevæge sig tilbage til fortovet og kommanderede, at de skulle afstemme deres ret til at demonstrere med ophobningen af trafik.
source: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up.

reference: Omkring 11:29 bevægede demonstrationen sig op ad Whitehall, forbi Trafalgar Square, langs the Strand, forbi Aldwych og op ad Kingsway i retning af Holborn, hvor det Konservative parti afholdt deres forårs-forum på hotellet Grand Connaught Rooms.
source: Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

reference: Nadals mand-til-mand rekord mod canadieren er 7–2.
source: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2.

reference: Han tabte for nylig til Raonic i Brisbane Open.
source: He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open.

reference: Nadal scorede 88% af de samlede point i kampen og vandt 76% af sine førsteserver.
source: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve.

reference: Efter kampen udtalte Lerets Konge: "Jeg er bare glad for at være tilbage i de sidste runder af de vigtigste begivenheder. Jeg er her for at vinde."
source: After the match, King of Clay said, "I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."

reference: "Panama-papirerne" er en paraplybetegnelse for ca. ti millioner dokumenter fra det panamanske advokatfirma Mossack Fonseca, der blev lækket til pressen i foråret 2016.
source: "Panama Papers" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.

reference: Dokumenterne viste, at 14 banker hjalp velhavende kunder med at skjule formuer på milliarder af amerikanske dollars for at undgå skatter og andre reguleringer.
source: The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.

reference: Den britiske avis The Guardian mente, at Deutsche Bank kontrollerede cirka en tredjedel af de 1200 skuffeselskaber, der blev brugt til at opnå dette.
source: British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.

reference: Der var protester over hele verden, adskillige retsforfølgelser, og lederne af Islands og Pakistans regeringer trådte begge tilbage.
source: There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.

reference: Ma er født i Hong Kong og studerede på New York University og Harvard Law School og havde engang et amerikansk "green card" for fastboende personer.
source: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card".

reference: Hsieh antydede under valget, at Ma ville flygte fra landet i en krisetid.
source: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis.

reference: Hsieh argumenterede også, at den fotogene Ma var mere stil end substans.
source: Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance.

reference: På trods af disse beskyldninger vandt Ma med lethed ved at tale for tættere bånd med det kinesiske fastland.
source: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.

reference: Dagens spiller er, i dag, Alex Ovechkin fra Washington Capitals.
source: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.

reference: Han lavede 2 mål og 2 målgivende afleveringer i Washingtons 5-3 sejr over Atlanta Thrashers.
source: He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.

reference: Aftenens første assist for Ovechkins var på det kampvindende mål af debutanten Nicklas Backstrom;
source: Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom;

reference: hans andet mål denne aften var hans 60. i denne sæson, og han blev den første spiller som har scoret 60 eller flere mål i en sæson siden 1995-96, da Jaromir Jagr og Mario Lemieux begge nåede den milepæl.
source: his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

reference: Batten var med en anslået formue på 2,3 milliarder $ nummer 190 på ranglisten over de 400 rigeste amerikanere i 2008.
source: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion.

reference: Han dimitterede fra College of Arts & Sciences fra University of Virginia i 1950 og var en betydelig bidragsyder til institutionen.
source: He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

reference: Iraks Abu Ghraib-fængsel er blevet sat i brand under et oprør.
source: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot.

reference: Fængslet blev berygtet, da fangermisbrug blev opdaget, efter de amerikanske styrker overtog ledelsen.
source: The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

reference: Piquet Jr. havde en ulykke i Grand Prix i Singapore lige efter et tidligt pitstop til Fernando Alonso, hvilket fik sikkerhedsbilen ud.
source: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car.

reference: Da bilerne foran Alonso stoppede for at tanke op under følge af sikkerhedsbilen, rykkede han op i rækken og tog sejren.
source: As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory.

reference: Piquet Jr. blev fyret efter Grand Prixet i Ungarn i 2009.
source: Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

reference: Præcis klokken 8:46 faldt der en stilhed over byen som markerede det nøjagtige øjeblik, hvor det første fly ramte sit mål.
source: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.

reference: To stråler af lys er blevet installeret, således at de peger op mod himlen i løbet af natten.
source: Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight.

reference: Bygningen af fem nye skyskrabere er i gang på stedet med et transportcenter og en mindepark i midten.
source: Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

reference: PBS-showet har vundet mere end to dusin Emmy-priser, og den har løbet i længere tid end alle andre programmer på nær Sesame Street og Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.
source: The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.

reference: Hver episode af showet fokuserede på et tema i en bestemt bog, og dette tema blev derefter udforsket gennem flere historier.
source: Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories.

reference: Hvert show gav også anbefalinger til bøger, som børn skulle lede efter, når de gik på biblioteket.
source: Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library.

reference: John Grant fra WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbows hjemmekanal) sagde "Reading Rainbow lærte børn, hvorfor de skulle læse... kærligheden til at læse – [showet] opfordrede til at tage en bog frem og til at læse."
source: John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."

reference: Nogen mener, herunder John Grant, at både finansieringsknuden og skiftet i filosofien om undervisnings-TV havde indflydelse på, at serien sluttede.
source: It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series.

reference: Prognoserne siger, at stormen, der er omkring 645 mil (1040 km) vest for Kap Verde-øerne, sandsynligvis vil forsvinde, før den truer nogen landområder.
source: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say.

reference: Fred har i øjeblikket vinde på 165 km/t og bevæger sig mod nordvest.
source: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest.

reference: Fred er den heftigste tropiske cyklon, der nogensinde er blevet registreret så sydligt og østligt i Atlanterhavet, siden man begyndte at bruge satellitbilleder, og kun den tredje store orkan, der er registreret øst for 35°V.
source: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

reference: Den 24. september 1759 underskrev Arthur Guinness en 9.000-års lejeaftale af St James' Gate-bryggeriet i Dublin, Irland.
source: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland.

reference: 250 år senere er Guinness vokset til en global virksomhed, som omsætter for 10 milliarder Euro (14,7 miliarder US$) hvert år.
source: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

reference: Jonny Reid, medchauffør for det new zealandske A1GP team, skrev historie i dag ved at køre hurtigst over den 48 år gamle Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, helt lovligt.
source: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally.

reference: Mr Reid formåede at køre New Zealands A1GP-bil, Black Beauty, over broen syv gange med en hastighed på over 160 km/t.
source: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge.

reference: Det newzealandske politi havde svært ved at bruge deres fartkontrol til at se hvor hurtigt Hr. Reid virkelig kørte, på grund af hvor lav Black Beauty er. Den eneste gang politiet formåede at fange Hr. Reid, var da han satte farten ned til 160 km/t.
source: The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

reference: I løbet af de sidste 3 måneder er over 80 arresterede blevet løsladt fra Central Booking uden at blive anklaget officielt.
source: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged.

reference: I april i år blev der udstedt et midlertidigt polititilhold af dommer Glynn mod faciliteten, for at håndhæve løsladelsen af dem der blev tilbageholdt i mere end 24 timer, efter de blev anholdt, og som ikke blev afhørt af en kommissær.
source: In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner.

reference: Kommissæren fastsætter kautionen hvis bevilget og formaliserer sigtelserne, der er indgivet af den arresterende betjent. Sigtelserne bliver derpå indtastet i statens computersystem, hvor sagen følges.
source: The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked.

reference: Høringen markerer også datoen for den mistænktes ret til en hurtig retssag.
source: The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

reference: Peter Costello, som er en australsk kasserer og den person der højest sandsynligt kommer til at efterfølge premierminister John Howard som partileder i det liberale parti, har givet sin støtte til atomkraftindustrien i Australien.
source: Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia.

reference: Mr Costello sagde, at når kernekraftproduktion bliver økonomisk levedygtig, burde Australien fortsætte med at bruge det.
source: Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use.

reference: "Hvis det bliver kommercielt, skal vi have det. Det vil sige, at der ikke er nogen principiel indvending imod atomenergi", sagde Mr Costello.
source: "If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy" Mr Costello said.

reference: Ifølge Ansa var "politiet bekymret for et par angreb fra øverste niveau, som de frygtede kunne udløse en regulær arvefølgekrig.
source: According to Ansa, "police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession.

reference: Politiet udtalte, at Lo Piccolo stod stærkest, da han i Palermo havde været Provenzanos højre hånd, og hans større erfaring sikrede ham respekt fra den ældre generation af ledere, da de fulgte Provenzanos politik om at holde så lav profil som muligt og styrke deres netværk på samme tid.
source: Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network.

reference: Disse ledere var blevet indfanget af Provenzano, da han sluttede den Riina-drevne krig mod den stat, der tog livet af de hævngerrige mafiamedlemmer Giovanni Falcone og Paolo Borsellino i 1992."
source: These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."

reference: Apple CEO Steve Jobs præsenterede enheden, da han trådte frem på scenen og tog sin iPhone op af bukselommen.
source: Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket.

reference: Under hans to timers lange tale sagde han, at "I dag genopfinder Apple telefonen, i dag skriver vi historie".
source: During his 2 hour speech he stated that "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today".

reference: Brasilien er det største romersk-katolske land i verden, og den romersk-katolske kirke har konsekvent modsat sig legaliseringen af homoseksuelle ægteskaber i landet.
source: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country.

reference: Brasiliens nationalkongres har drøftet legalisering i 10 år, og sådanne borgerlige ægteskaber er i øjeblikket kun lovlige i Rio Grande do Sul.
source: The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul.

reference: Det oprindelige lovforslag blev skrevet af Marta Suplicy, den tidligere borgmester i São Paulo. Den foreslåede lovændring er nu i hænderne på Roberto Jefferson, efter at den er blevet ændret.
source: The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson.

reference: Demonstranterne håber at indsamle 1,2 millioner underskrifter, som de vil overbringe til Nationalkongressen i november.
source: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

reference: Da det stod klart at mange familier søgte juridisk hjælp til at bekæmpe udsættelserne, blev der den 20. marts afholdt et møde på East Bay Community Law Center for ofrene for boligsnyderiet.
source: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam.

reference: Da lejerne begyndte at tale om, hvad der var sket, forstod de fleste af de involverede familier pludselig, at Carolyn Wilson fra Oaklands boligkontor havde stjålet deres depositum og forladt byen.
source: When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town.

reference: Lejere i Lockwood Gardens mener, at mindst 40 andre familier kan blive sat på gaden, efter de fandt ud af, at OHA-politistyrken også efterforsker andre offentlige boligejendomme i Oakland, som kan være en del af boligbedrageriet.
source: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

reference: Bandet undskyldte til deres fans og aflyste showet på Mauis War Memorial Stadium, som var planlagt til at blive overværet af 9.000 mennesker,
source: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans.

reference: HK Management Inc., der er bandets administrationsselskab, gav ikke nogen umiddelbar begrundelse, da de aflyste den 20. september, men begrundede det med logistiske årsager den følgende dag.
source: The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

reference: De berømte græske advokater Sakis Kechagioglou og George Nikolakopoulos er blevet fængslet i Korydallus-fængslet i Athen, da de blev fundet skyldige i udnyttelse af deres embede og korruption.
source: The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption.

reference: Som resultat heraf er der opstået en stor skandale i det græske retssystem efter afsløringen af ulovlige handlinger foretaget af dommere, advokater, sagførere og jurister gennem de seneste år.
source: As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years.

reference: For et par uger siden, efter informationerne blev udgivet af journalisten Makis Triantafylopoulos i hans populære TV-show "Zoungla" på Alpha TV, måtte parlamentsmedlem og advokat Petros Mantouvalos abdicere, da medlemmer af hans embede havde været involveret i ulovlig bestikkelse og korruption.
source: A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show "Zoungla" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption.

reference: Desuden er topdommeren Evangelos Kalousis blevet fængslet, efter at være blevet kendt skyldig i korruption og respektløs opførsel.
source: Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour.

reference: Roberts nægtede blankt at sige noget om, hvornår han mener, at livet begynder, hvilket er et vigtigt spørgsmål, når man overvejer etikken ved abort. Han sagde, at det ville være uetisk at kommentere på detaljerne i lignende sager.
source: Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases.

reference: Han gentog dog sin tidligere erklæring om, at Roe v. Wade var "landets etablerede lov" og understregede vigtigheden af, at højesteretten træffer konsekvente afgørelser.
source: He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the "settled law of the land", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings.

reference: Han bekræftede også at han troede på den underforståede ret til privatliv, som Roe-beslutningen hvilede på.
source: He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon.

reference: Maroochydore endte øverst på ranglisten seks points foran Noosa på andenpladsen.
source: Maroochydore had finished on top of the ladder, six points clear of Noosa in second.

reference: De to sider mødtes i den store semifinale, hvor Noosa kom ud som vindere med 11 point.
source: The two sides would meet in the major semi final where Noosa ran out winners by 11 points.

reference: Derefter vandt Maroochydore over Caboolture i den indledende finale.
source: Maroochydore then defeated Caboolture in the Preliminary Final.

reference: Hesperonychus elizabethae er en art af Dromaeosauridae-familien og er i samme slægt som Velociraptor.
source: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor .

reference: Denne fuldfjerede, varmblodede rovfugl menes at have gået oprejst på to ben med kløer som Velociraptoren.
source: This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor.

reference: Dens anden klo var større, hvilket gav den navnet Hesperonychus, som betyder "vestlig klo."
source: Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means "western claw."

reference: Ud over den altdominerende is har ekstreme vejrforhold hæmmet redningsindsatsen.
source: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts.

reference: Pittman antydede at forholdene ikke ville blive bedre før engang i næste uge.
source: Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week.

reference: Ifølge Pittman er mængden samt tykkelsen af pakisen værre for sæljægere, end den har været de sidste 15 år.
source: The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

reference: Mens mindehøjtideligheder for Jeff Weise og tre af de ni ofre blev afholdt i dag, spredte nyheden om, at endnu en elev var blevet anholdt i forbindelse med skoleskyderiet d. 21. marts, sig i Red Lakes lokalsamfund.
source: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21.

reference: Myndighederne sagde ikke meget officielt ud over at bekræfte anholdelsen i dag.
source: Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest.

reference: En kilde med kendskab til efterforskningen fortalte dog Minneapolis Star-Tribune, at det var Louis Jourdain, Floyd Jourdains 16-årige søn, som er formanden for Red Lake Tribal.
source: However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.

reference: Det vides på nuværende tidspunkt ikke, hvilke anklager han bliver tiltalt for, eller hvad der førte myndighederne til drengen, men procedure for mindreårige er blevet indledt ved føderal domstol.
source: It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

reference: Lodin sagde desuden, at embedsmændene besluttede sig for at annullere omvalget for at spare afghanerne for udgifterne og sikkerhedsrisikoen ved endnu et valg.
source: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election.

reference: Diplomater sagde, at de havde fundet nok tvetydighed i den afghanske forfatning til at erklære omvalget for unødvendigt.
source: Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary.

reference: Dette modsiger de tidligere beretninger, som sagde, at det ville have været imod forfatningen at aflyse genvalget.
source: This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

reference: Flyet var på vej mod Irkutsk, og blev betjent af interne tropper.
source: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops.

reference: Der er oprettet en forespørgsel, og en undersøgelse vil blive sat i gang.
source: An inquiry was established to investigate.

reference: Il-76 har været en vigtig komponent inden for både det russiske og det sovjetiske militær siden 1970'erne og havde allerede opdaget en alvorlig ulykke i Rusland sidste måned.
source: The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month.

reference: Den 7. oktober løsrev en motor sig under afgang uden tilskadekomst. Rusland tilbageholdt for en kort stund Il-76-modeller efter denne ulykke.
source: On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

reference: 800 mil af Trans-Alaska Pipeline Systemet blev lukket ned efter udslippet fra tusinder af tønder råolie syd for Fairbanks, Alaska.
source: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

reference: Et strømsvigt i forbindelse med en rutinemæssig test af brandkommandosystemet betød, at overtryksventiler åbnede sig, og råolie flød over tæt på Fort Greely pumpestation 9.
source: A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9.

reference: Åbningen af ventilerne førte til en trykudløsning for systemet, og olie strømmede ud på en flade og videre til en tank, der kan rumme 55.000 tønder (2,3 millioner gallons).
source: The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons).

reference: Onsdag eftermiddag var tankens ventiler stadig utætte sandsynligvis på grund af varmeudvidelsen inde i tanken.
source: As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank.

reference: Et andet sekundært afspærringsområde under tankene, som kan rumme 104.500 tønder, var endnu ikke fyldt helt op.
source: Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

reference: Kommentarerne, der blev vist på live TV, var første gang at højtstående iranske kilder indrømmede, at sanktionerne har en virkning.
source: The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect.

reference: De inkluderer finansielle restriktioner og et forbud fra EU mod eksporten af råolie, hvorfra den iranske økonomi får 80% af sine udenlandske indtægter.
source: They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income.

reference: I sin seneste månedsrapport sagde OPEC, at eksporten af råolie var faldet til 2,8 millioner tønder om dagen, hvilket er det laveste niveau i to årtier.
source: In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day.

reference: Landets øverste leder Ayatollah Ali Khamenei har beskrevet afhængigheden af olie som "en fælde" dateret tilbage fra før Irans islamiske revolution i 1979, og hvorfra landet skulle frigøre sig.
source: The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as "a trap" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself.

reference: Når kapslen kommer til Jorden og kommer ind i atmosfæren, cirka kl. 05:00 (østlig tid), forventes det at lave noget af et lysshow for folk, der bor i det nordlige Californien, Oregon, Nevada og Utah.
source: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah.

reference: Kapslen kommer til at se ud som et stjerneskud, der går over himlen.
source: The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky.

reference: Kapslen bevæger sig med cirka 12,8 km i sekundet, eller 8 mil i sekundet, hvilket er hurtigt nok til at komme fra San Francisco til Los Angeles på blot ét minut.
source: The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute.

reference: Stardust vil sætte en ny historisk rekord ved at være det hurtigste rumfartøj til at returnere til Jorden, hvorved det bryder den tidligere rekord, der blev sat i 1969, da Apollo X kommandomodulet returnerede.
source: Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module.

reference: "Det vil bevæge sig henover vestkysten i det nordlige Californien og vil oplyse himlen fra Californien gennem det centrale Oregon og videre gennem Nevada og Idaho samt ind i Utah." fortalte Tom Duxbury, Stardusts projektchef.
source: “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

reference: Mr. Rudds beslutning om at underskrive Kyoto-protokollen isolerer USA, som nu vil være det eneste i-land, der ikke ratificerer aftalen.
source: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement.

reference: Australiens tidligere konservative regering nægtede at ratificere Kyoto og sagde, at det ville skade økonomien som i høj grad er afhængig af kuleksport, mens lande som Indien og Kina ikke var bundet af emissionsmål.
source: Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

reference: Det er den største erhvervelse i eBays historie.

reference: Forskere har mistænkt Enceladus for at være geologisk aktiv og en mulig kilde for Saturns isnende E-ring.

reference: ACMA opdagede derudover også, at på trods af at videoen blev streamet på internettet, overtrådte "Big Brother" ikke lovgivningen om online indholdscensur, da videoen ikke var blevet gemt på "Big Brother"s hjemmeside.

source: The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya.

source: The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

source: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games.

reference: Retssagen fandt sted i Birmingham Crown Court og afsluttede den 3. august.

reference: Mørk energi er en helt usynlig kraft, der konstant virker i universet.

reference: Den kendes kun på grund af dens effekter på udvidelsen af universet.

reference: "Vi var alle simpelthen i chok", sagde moderen.

reference: Hun udtalte: "Der er ingen oplysninger, som indikerer, at et angreb er umiddelbart forestående.
source: She said, "There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently.

source: This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

source: Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted.

source: The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future.

reference: Karno er en velkendt, men kontroversiel engelsklærer, der underviste under Modern Education og King's Glory og hævdede at have 9.000 studerende, da hans karriere var størst.
source: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career.

reference: Han brugte ord i sine noter, som nogle forældre betragtede som grove, og han brugte angiveligt bandeord i timen.
source: In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class.

reference: Modern Education beskyldte ham for at have printet store reklamer på busser uden tilladelse og lyve ved at sige, at han var den øverste engelsktutor.
source: Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor.

reference: Han er før blevet beskyldt for krænkelse af ophavsretten, men der blev ikke rejst sigtelse mod ham.
source: He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged.

reference: En tidligere elev fortalte, at han 'brugte slang i klassen, gav dating-tips i noter og var som en ven for eleverne.'
source: A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

reference: I løbet af de sidste tre årtier har Kina udviklet en markedsøkonomi, selvom landet officielt stadig er en kommunistisk stat.
source: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy.

reference: De første økonomiske reformer blev foretaget under Deng Xiaopings ledelse.
source: The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping.

reference: Siden dengang er Kinas størrelse ud fra et økonomisk perspektiv vokset 90 gange.
source: Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times.

reference: For første gang sidste år eksporterede Kina flere biler end Tyskland, og de overgik også USA som det største marked i denne industri.
source: For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry.

reference: Kinas BNP kan blive større end USAs inden for to årtier.
source: China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

reference: Den tropiske storm Danielle, den fjerde navngivne storm i den Atlantiske orkansæson i 2010, er dannet i det østlige Atlanterhav.
source: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean.

reference: Stormen, der er omkring 3.000 mil fra Miami, Florida, har en maksimal vedvarende vind på 40 mil i timen (64 km/t).
source: The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph).

reference: Videnskabsfolk ved National Hurricane Center forudsiger, at Danielle vil øges i styrke og blive til en orkan inden onsdag.
source: Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday.

reference: Da stormen er langt fra land, er det stadig svært at vurdere dens potentielle skade i USA og Caribien.
source: As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

reference: Bobek er født i den kroatiske hovedstad Zagreb, og fik sin berømmelse mens han spillede for Partizan Beograd.
source: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade.

reference: Han kom til klubben i 1945 og blev indtil 1958.
source: He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958.

reference: I løbet af sin tid på holdet scorede han 403 mål i 468 kampe.
source: During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances.

reference: Ingen har nogensinde været mere med eller scoret ligeså mange mål for klubben end Bobek.
source: No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek.

reference: I 1995 blev han ved afstemning valgt som den bedste spiller i Partizans historie.
source: In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

reference: Festlighederne startede med et fremragende show fra den verdenskendte gruppe, Cirque du Soleil.
source: The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil.

reference: De blev efterfulgt af Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, et janitshar-band, og sangerne Fatih Erkoç og Müslüm Gürses.
source: It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses.

reference: Så gik hvirvlende dervish-dansere på scenen.
source: Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage.

reference: Den tyrkiske diva, Sezen Aksu, optrådte med den italienske tenor Alessandro Safina samt den græske sangerinde, Haris Alexiou.
source: Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou.

reference: Til sidst blev showet "Troy" opført af den tyrkiske dansegruppe, "Fire of Anatolia".
source: To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show "Troy".

reference: 13-årige motorcykelracer, Peter Lenz, er død i en ulykke på Indianapolis Motor Speedway.
source: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.

reference: Under sin opvarmningsrunde faldt Lenz ned af sin motorcykel, og blev derefter ramt af en anden racerkører Xavier Zayat.
source: While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat.

reference: Han blev med det samme tilset af det medicinske personale på banen og transporteret til et lokalt hospital, hvor han senere døde.
source: He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died.

reference: Zayat kom ikke noget til i forbindelse med ulykken.
source: Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

reference: I forhold til den globale økonomiske situation udtalte Zapatero dernæst, at "det finansielle system er en del af økonomien, en essentiel del.
source: Regarding the global financial situation, Zapatero continued by saying that "the financial system is a part of the economy, a crucial part.

reference: Vi har en årelang finanskrise, som har haft sin hårdeste periode i de sidste to måneder, og jeg tror at finansmarkederne nu er begyndt at komme tilbage til et normalt niveau."
source: We have a year-long financial crisis, which has had its most acute moment in the past two months, and I think now the financial markets are beginning to recover."

reference: Sidste uge meddelte Naked News, at de ville øge deres internationale sprogmandat til nyhedsrapportering markant med tre nye udsendelser.
source: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts.

reference: Den globale organisation, der allerede rapporterer på engelsk og japansk, lancerer spanske, italienske og koreanske programmer til fjernsyn, internet og mobile enheder.
source: Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

reference: ”Heldigvis skete der ikke noget med mig, men det var et makabert syn, da folk prøvede at smadre vinduer for at komme ud.
source: "Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out.

reference: Folk slog på ruderne med stole, men vinduerne kunne ikke smadres.
source: People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable.

reference: "En af ruderne blev endelig smadret, og de begyndte at slippe ud gennem vinduerne," sagde overlevende Franciszek Kowal.
source: One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window," said survivor Franciszek Kowal.

reference: Stjerner afgiver lys og varme på grund af den energi, der fremstilles, når hydrogenatomer slås (eller smeltes) sammen for at forme tungere elementer.
source: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements.

reference: Videnskabsmænd arbejder på at fremstille en reaktor, der kan producere energi på den samme måde.
source: Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way.

reference: Dette er dog et meget svært problem at løse, og der vil gå mange år, før vi ser brugbare fusionsreaktorer blive bygget.
source: This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.

reference: Stålnålen flyder oven på vandet på grund af overfladespænding.
source: The steel needle floats on top of the water because of surface tension.

reference: Overfladespænding foregår, fordi vandmolekylerne på overfladen af vandet er stærkt tiltrukket til hinanden, mere end de er til luftmolekylerne over dem.
source: Surface tension happens because the water molecules at the surface of the water are strongly attracted to each other more than they are to the air molecules above them.

reference: Vandmolekylerne samler sig og danner en usynlig hinde på vandets overflade, som gør det muligt for objekter såsom nåle at flyde.
source: The water molecules make an invisible skin on the water’s surface that allows things like the needle to float on top of the water.

reference: Bladet på en moderne skøjte er tveægget med en hul konkav imellem dem. De to kanter giver et bedre greb på isen, selv når de hælder.
source: The blade on a modern ice skate has a double edge with a concave hollow between them. The two edges allow for a better grasp of the ice, even when tilted.

reference: Da bunden af klingen er let kurvet, buer den kant som er i kontakt med isen også, når klingen vipper til den ene eller den anden side.
source: Because the bottom of the blade is slightly curved, as the blade tilts to one side or the other, the edge which is in contact with the ice also curves.

reference: Dette får skøjteløberen til at dreje. Hvis skøjterne hælder til højre, drejer skøjteløberen til højre, og hvis skøjterne hælder til venstre, drejer skøjteløberen til venstre.
source: This causes the skater to turn. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left.

reference: For at vende tilbage til deres tidligere energiniveau, skal de forbrænde den ekstra energi de fik fra lyset.
source: To return to their previous energy level, they must get rid of the extra energy they got from the light.

reference: Det gør dette ved at udsende en lille lyspartikel, som kaldes en "foton".
source: They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a "photon".

reference: Forskere kalder denne proces "stimuleret udsendelse af stråling", fordi atomerne stimuleres af det klare lys, hvilket forårsager udsendelsen af en lysfoton, og lys er en slags stråling.
source: Scientists call this process "stimulated emission of radiation" because the atoms are stimulated by the bright light, causing the emission of a photon of light, and light is a type of radiation.

reference: Det næste billede viser atomerne udsende fotoner. I virkeligheden er fotoner selvfølgelig meget mindre end dem der ses på billedet.
source: The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture.

reference: Fotoner er endnu mindre end dét, som atomer består af!
source: Photons are even smaller than the stuff that makes up atoms!

reference: Efter hundredvis af timers drift brænder pærens glødetråd efterhånden ud, og pæren virker ikke mere.
source: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works.

reference: Derefter skal pæren udskiftes. Det er vigtigt at være forsigtig ved udskiftning af pæren.
source: The light bulb then needs replacing. It is necessary to be careful in replacing the light bulb.

reference: Først skal lyskontakten være slukket, eller stikket skal være taget ud.
source: First, the switch for the light fixture needs to be turned off or the cable disconnected.

reference: Dette skyldes, at elektricitet, der strømmer ind i kontakten hvor den metalliske del af pæren sidder, kan give dig et alvorligt elektrisk stød, hvis du rører indersiden af kontakten eller metallet på bunden af pæren, mens den stadig sidder delvist i soklen.
source: This is because electricity flowing into the socket where the metallic part of bulb sits can give you a severe electric shock if you touch the inside of the socket or the metal base of the bulb while it is still partly in the socket.

reference: Det største organ i kroppens kredsløbssystem er hjertet, som pumper blodet rundt.
source: The major organ of the circulatory system is the heart, which pumps the blood.

reference: Blod ledes væk fra hjertet i årer som kaldes arterier og kommer tilbage til hjertet i årer som kaldes vener. De mindste årer kaldes kapillærer.
source: Blood goes away from the heart in tubes called arteries and comes back to the heart in tubes called veins. The smallest tubes are called capillaries.

reference: En Triceratops' tænder ville have været i stand til at knuse ikke kun blade men også meget hårde grene og rødder.
source: A triceratops' teeth would have been able to crush not only leaves but even very tough branches and roots.

reference: Nogle forskere mener, at Triceratops spiste koglepalmer, en plantetype som var almindelig i kridttiden.
source: Some scientists think Triceratops ate cycads, which are a type of plant that was common in the Cretaceous.

reference: Disse planter ligner et lille palmetræ med en krone af skarpe blade med pigge.
source: These plants look like a small palm tree with a crown of sharp, spiky leaves.

reference: En Triceratops kan have brugt sit stærke næb til at fjerne bladene, før den spiste stammen.
source: A Triceratops could have used its strong beak to strip off the leaves before eating the trunk.

reference: Andre videnskabsmænd hævder at disse planter er meget giftige, så det er usandsynligt at nogle dinosaurer spiste dem, selvom både dovendyret samt andre dyr såsom papegøjen (en efterkommer af dinosaurer) i dag er i stand til at spise giftige blade og/eller frugter.
source: Other scientists argue that these plants are very poisonous so it is unlikely that any dinosaur ate them, even though today the sloth and other animals like the parrot (a descendant of the dinosaurs) can eat poisonous leaves or fruit.

reference: Hvordan ville Io's tyngdekraft påvirke mig? Hvis du stod på overfladen af Io, ville du veje mindre, end du gør på jorden.
source: How would Io's gravity pull on me? If you stood on the surface of Io, you would weigh less than you do on Earth.

reference: En person, som vejer 200 pund (90 kg) på jorden, ville veje omkring 36 pund (16 kg) på Io. Så tyngdekraften trækker selvfølgelig mindre i en.
source: A person who weighs 200 pounds (90kg) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16kg) on Io. So the gravity, of course, pulls less on you.

reference: Solen har ikke en skorpe som du kan stå på, ligesom Jorden har. Hele Solen består af gasser, ild og plasma.
source: The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma.

reference: Gassen bliver tyndere, jo længere væk du kommer fra solens centrum.
source: The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun.

reference: Den ydre del, som vi kan se, når vi kigger på Solen, kaldes fotosfæren, hvilket betyder "lyskugle".
source: The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means "ball of light".

reference: Cirka tre tusinde år senere, i 1610, anvendte den italienske astronom Galileo Galilei et teleskop til at observere, at Venus har faser, ligesom månen har.
source: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does.

reference: Faser sker fordi det kun er den ene side af Venus (eller Månen), der vender mod solen får lys. Venus' faser understøttede Copernicus' teori om, at planeterne kredser rundt om solen.
source: Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun.

reference: Efterfølgende, et par år senere i 1639, observerede en engelsk astronom, ved navn Jeremiah Horrocks, en Venuspassage.
source: Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.

reference: England havde gennemlevet en lang periode med fred ovenpå generobringen af Danelagen.
source: England had experienced a long period of peace after the reconquest of the Danelaw.

reference: I 991 stod Ethelred dog overfor en vikingeflåde større end nogen før siden Guthrums flåde fra et århundrede tidligere.
source: However in 991 Ethelred was faced with a Viking fleet larger than any since Guthrum's a century earlier.

reference: Denne flåde blev ledet af Olaf Trygvasson, en nordmand med ambitioner om at generobre sit land fra dansk herredømme.
source: This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination.

reference: Efter indledningsvise militære tilbageslag var Ethelred i stand til at blive enig om vilkårene med Olaf, som vendte tilbage til Norge for at prøve at vinde sit kongerige med delvis succes.
source: After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success.

reference: Hangeul er det eneste bevidst skabte alfabet som bruges bredt i dagligdagen. Alfabetet blev opfundet i 1444 under kong Sejongs regeringstid (1418-1450).
source: Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450).

reference: Kong Sejong var den fjerde konge af Joseon-dynastiet og er en af de mest respekterede.
source: King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded.

reference: Oprindeligt navngav han Hangul-alfabetet Hunmin Jeongeum, hvilket betyder "de rigtige lyde til instruktion af folket".
source: He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means "the correct sounds for the instruction of the people".

reference: Der er mange teorier om, hvordan sanskrit blev til. En af dem handler om en arisk migration fra vesten til Indien, hvor de tog deres sprog med sig.
source: There are many theories to how Sanskrit came into existence. One of them is about an Aryan migration from the west into India who brought their language with them.

reference: Sanskrit er et gammelt sprog og kan sammenlignes med det latinske sprog, der tales i Europa.
source: Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe.

reference: Den tidligst kendte bog i verden blev skrevet på sanskrit. Efter samlingen af upanishaderne falmede sanskrit simpelthen som et resultat af hierarki.
source: The earliest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of Upanishads, Sanskrit just faded due to hierarchy.

reference: Sanskrit er et meget komplekst og rigt sprog, som har dannet grundlag for mange moderne, indiske sprog, ligesom latin danner grundlag for europæiske sprog som fransk og spansk.
source: Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language, which has served to be the source for many modern Indian languages, just like Latin is the source for European languages like French and Spanish.

reference: Da kampen om Frankrig var ovre, begyndte Tyskland at forberede sig til at invadere Storbritannien.
source: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain.

reference: Tyskland gav angrebet kodenavnet "Operation Søløve". De fleste af den britiske hærs tunge våben og forsyninger var gået tabt da de evakuerede fra Dunkerque, så hæren var ret svag.
source: Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak.

reference: Men Royal Navy var stadig meget stærkere end den tyske flåde (“Kriegsmarine”) og kunne have ødelagt en hvilken som helst invaderende flåde, der blev sendt over den engelske kanal.
source: But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel.

reference: Det var dog meget få af Royal Navys skibe som var baseret tæt på de sandsynlige invasionruter, da admiralerne frygtede at de ville blive sunket af tyske luftangreb.
source: However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

reference: Lad os begynde med en forklaring om Italiens planer. Italien var hovedsageligt Tysklands og Japans "lillebror".
source: Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the "little brother" of Germany and Japan.

reference: Det havde en svagere hær og en svagere flåde, selvom de lige havde bygget fire nye skibe lige før krigen startede.
source: It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war.

reference: Italiens hovedmål var afrikanske lande. For at erobre disse lande skulle de bruge en affyringsrampe til tropperne, så disse kunne sejle henover Middelhavet og invadere Afrika.
source: Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa.

reference: Til det var de nødt til at komme af med britiske baser og skibe i Ægypten. Udover dette var det ikke meningen, at Italiens krigsskibe skulle foretage sig noget andet.
source: For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else.

reference: Nu til Japan. Japan var et ørige ligesom Storbritannien.
source: Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain.

reference: Ubåde er skibe der er designet til at rejse under vand, og forblive der i en længevarende tidsperiode.
source: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time.

reference: Ubåde blev benyttet i både den første og anden verdenskrig. Dengang var de meget langsomme og havde en meget begrænset skydnings rækkevidde.
source: Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range.

reference: I starten af krigen rejste de primært ovenpå vandet, men da radaren begyndte at udvikle sig og blev mere præcis, blev ubådene tvunget til at gå under vandet for at undgå at blive set.
source: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

reference: Tyske undervandsbåde blev kaldt for U-både. Tyskerne var meget dygtige til at styre og betjene deres undervandsbåde.
source: German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines.

reference: På grund af deres succes med ubåde, har man siden krigen ikke stolet nok på tyskerne til at lade dem have mange af dem.
source: Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

reference: Ja! Kong Tutankhamun, nogle gange omtalt som "Kong Tut" eller "Drengekongen", er en af de mest velkendte oldgamle egyptiske konger i moderne tider.
source: Yes! King Tutankhamun, sometimes referred to as "King Tut" or "The Boy King", is one of the most well known ancient Egyptian kings in modern times.

reference: Interessant nok blev han ikke betragtet som værende særligt vigtig i oldtiden, og på de fleste gamle kongelister blev han slet ikke registreret.
source: Interestingly, he was not considered to be very important in ancient times and was not recorded on most ancient king lists.

reference: Men opdagelsen af hans grav i 1922 gjorde ham berømt. Selvom mange af fortidens grave blev røvet, var der stort set ikke blev rørt ved hans grav.
source: However, the discovery of his tomb in 1922 made him a celebrity. While many tombs of the past were robbed, this tomb was left virtually undisturbed.

reference: Tusindvis af genstande fremstillet af ædelmetaller og sjældne sten blev begravet sammen med Tutankhamon og er stadig yderst velbevarede.
source: Most of the items buried with Tutankhamun have been well preserved, including thousands of artefacts made from precious metals and rare stones.

reference: Med opfindelsen af egerhjulet blev de assyriske stridsvogne både lettere, hurtigere og desuden bedre egnet til at indhente både soldater og andre stridsvogne.
source: The invention of spoke wheels made Assyrian chariots lighter, faster, and better prepared to outrun soldiers and other chariots.

reference: Pilene fra deres dødelige armbrøster kunne gennemtrænge fjendernes rustninger. Omkring år 1.000 f.Kr. introducerede assyrerne det første kavaleri.
source: Arrows from their deadly crossbows could penetrate the armor of rival soldiers. About 1000 B.C., the Assyrians introduced the first cavalry.

reference: Et kavaleri er en hær, der kæmper på hesteryg. Sadlen var ikke opfundet endnu, så den assyriske hær kæmpede på deres hestes bare rygge.
source: A cavalry is an army that fights on horseback. The saddle had not yet been invented, so the Assyrian cavalry fought on the bare backs of their horses.

reference: Vi kender mange græske politikere, videnskabsmænd og kunstnere. Homer, den legendariske blinde digter, der måske er den mest kendte person fra denne kultur, komponerede to mesterværker i græsk litteratur: Digtene Iliaden og Odysseen.
source: We know many Greek politicians, scientists, and artists. Possibly the most known person of this culture is Homer, the legendary blind poet, who composed two masterpieces of Greek literature: the poems Iliad and Odyssey.

reference: Sofokles og Aristofanes er stadig populære dramatikere, og deres skuespil anses for at være blandt verdenslitteraturens største værker.
source: Sophocles and Aristophanes are still popular playwrights and their plays are considered to be among the greatest works of world literature.

reference: En anden berømt græker er matematikeren Pythagoras, som er mest kendt for sin berømte sætning om forholdet mellem siderne i en retvinklet trekant.
source: Another famous Greek is a mathematician Pythagoras, mostly known for his famous theorem about relations of the sides of right triangles.

reference: Der er forskellige estimater over hvor mange mennesker der taler Hindi. Det antages at være mellem det andet og fjerde mest almindeligt talte sprog i verden.
source: There are varying estimates for how many people speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most commonly spoken language in the world.

reference: Antallet af personer, der taler deres modersmål, varierer, afhængigt af om man tæller meget tæt forbundne dialekter med eller ej.
source: The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted.

reference: Ud fra beregninger vurderes det, at der er mellem 340 millioner til 500 millioner talere og så mange som 800 millioner mennesker, der kan forstå sproget.
source: Estimates range from 340 million to 500 million speakers, and as many as 800 million people can understand the language.

reference: Hindi og urdu ligner hinanden i deres ordforråd men er forskellige i skrift; i daglig samtale kan talere af begge sprog normalt godt forstå hinanden.
source: Hindi and Urdu are similar in vocabulary but different in script; in everyday conversations, speakers of both languages can usually understand each other.

reference: Omkring det 15. århundrede blev det nordlige Estland i høj grad kulturelt påvirket  af Tyskland.
source: Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany.

reference: Nogle tyske munke ville bringe Gud tættere på de lokale mennesker, så de opfandt det estiske bogstavelige sprog.
source: Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language.

reference: Det var baseret på det tyske alfabet og et enkelt bogstav "Õ/õ" blev tilføjet.
source: It was based on the German alphabet and one character "Õ/õ" was added.

reference: Med tiden smeltede mange ord, som var lånt fra tysk, sammen. Dette var oplysningstidens begyndelse.
source: As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment.

reference: Traditionelt set ville tronarvingen gå direkte ind i militæret efter at have færdiggjort skolen.
source: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school.

reference: Charles gik dog på universitetet på Trinity College, Cambridge, hvor han studerede antropologi og arkæologi og senere historie og fik en 2:2 (en lavere andenklassesgrad).
source: However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree).

reference: Charles var det første medlem af den britiske kongefamilie, der fik en uddannelse.
source: Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.

reference: Den europæiske del af Tyrkiet (det østlige Thrakien eller Rumelia på Balkanhalvøen) udgør 3% af landet.
source: European Turkey (eastern Thrace or Rumelia in the Balkan peninsula) includes 3% of the country.

reference: Tyrkiets areal er mere end 1600 kilometer (1000 mil) lang og 800 km (500 mil) bred, og landet har en rektangulær form.
source: The territory of Turkey is more than 1,600 kilometres (1,000 mi) long and 800 km (500 mi) wide, with a roughly rectangular shape.

reference: Tyrkiets landområde, inklusive søer, er på 783.562 kvadratkilometer (300.948 kvadratmil), hvoraf 755.688 kvadratkilometer (291.773 kvadratmil) ligger i Sydvestasien og 23.764 kvadratkilometer (9.174 kvadratmil) ligger i Europa.
source: Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in south west Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe.

reference: Tyrkiets landområde gør den til verdens 37. største land, og det er cirka samme størrelse som det franske hovedland og Storbritannien tilsammen.
source: Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined.

reference: Tyrkiet er omgivet af have på tre sider: Det Ægæiske Hav mod vest, Sortehavet mod nord og Middelhavet mod syd.
source: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

reference: Luxembourg har en lang historie, men landets uafhængighed kan dateres tilbage til 1839.
source: Luxembourg has a long history but its independence dates from 1839.

reference: Dele af nutidens Belgien hørte førhen under Luxembourg, men blev belgiske efter den belgiske revolution i 1830'erne.
source: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

reference: Luxembourg har altid forsøgt at forblive et neutralt land, men det blev besat af Tyskland i både første og anden verdenskrig.
source: Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but it was occupied in both World War I and World War II by Germany.

reference: Luxembourg blev et af de stiftende medlemmer af den organisation der i dag er kendt som Den Europæiske Union, i 1957.
source: In 1957 Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization which is today known as the European Union.

reference: Drukgyal Dzong er en ødelagt fæstning og et buddhistisk kloster i den øvre del af Paro-distriktet (i landsbyen Phondey).
source: The Drukgyal Dzong is a ruined fortress and Buddhist monastery in the upper part of the Paro District (in Phondey Village).

reference: Det siges, at Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel i 1649 skabte fæstningen for at fejre sin sejr over de tibetansk-mongolske styrker.
source: It is said that in 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel created the fortress to commemorate his victory against the Tibetan-Mongol forces.

reference: En brand i 1951 efterlod kun nogle af Drukgyal Dzong-relikvierne såsom billedet af Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal.
source: In 1951, a fire caused for only some of the relics of the Drukgyal Dzong to remain, such as the image of Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal.

reference: Efter branden blev fæstningen bevaret og beskyttet og står nu som en af Bhutans mest seværdige attraktioner.
source: After the fire, the fortress was preserved and protected, remaining to be one of Bhutan's most sensational attractions.

reference: Under det 18. århundrede følte Cambodia sig klemt mellem de to magtfulde naboer, Thailand og Vietnam.
source: During the 18th century Cambodia found itself squeezed between two powerful neighbors, Thailand and Vietnam.

reference: Thailænderne invaderede Cambodja flere gange i det 18. århundrede og i 1772 ødelagde de Phnom Phen.
source: The Thais invaded Cambodia several times in the 18th century and in 1772 they destroyed Phnom Phen.

reference: Vietnameserne invaderede også Cambodja i slutningen af det 18. århundrede.
source: In the last years of the 18th century the Vietnamese also invaded Cambodia.

reference: Atten procent af venezuelanere er arbejdsløse, og de fleste af dem med arbejde, arbejder i den uformelle økonomi.
source: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy.

reference: To tredjedele af de venezuelanere der er i arbejde, arbejder inden for servicesektoren, næsten en fjerdedel arbejder inden for industrisektoren, og en femtedel arbejder med landbrug.
source: Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture.

reference: En vigtig industri for venezuelanere er olieindustrien, hvor landet er nettoeksportør, selvom kun én procent af befolkningen arbejder i olieindustrien.
source: An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.

reference: I tiden efter at Singapore var blevet uafhængigt, hjalp den botaniske haves ekspertise med at forvandle øen til en tropisk haveby.
source: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City.

reference: I 1981 blev orkidehybriden Vanda Miss Joaquim valgt som landets nationalblomst.
source: In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

reference: Hvert år omkring oktober krydser næsten 1,5 millioner planteædende arter Mara floden på rejse fra de nordlige bjerge mod de sydlige sletter og regnen.
source: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains.

reference: Og derefter tilbage nordpå gennem vesten - igen på tværs af Mara-floden efter regnsæsonen omkring april.
source: And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April.

reference: Serengeti-regionen omfatter Serengeti National Park, Ngorongoro Conservation Area og Maswa Game Reserve i Tanzania samt Maasai Mara National Reserve i Kenya.
source: The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

reference: At lære at skabe interaktive medier kræver konventionelle og traditionelle færdigheder samt værktøjer, der er lært i interaktive kurser (storyboards, lyd- og videoredigering, historiefortælling osv.)
source: Learning to create interactive media requires conventional and traditional skills, as well as tools mastered in interactive classes (storyboarding, audio and video editing, story telling, etc.)

reference: Interaktivt design kræver, at du revurderer dine antagelser om medieproduktion og lærer at tænke på ikke-lineære måder.
source: Interactive design requires that you re-assess your assumptions about media production and learn to think in a non-linear ways.

reference: Interaktivt design kræver, at komponenterne i et projekt kan forbindes med hinanden, men samtidig giver mening som separate enheder.
source: Interactive design requires that components of a project connect to each other, but also make sense as a separate entity.

reference: Ulempen ved zoomlinser er, at den fokale kompleksitet og antallet af linseelementer, der er påkrævet for at opnå en række brændvidder, er meget større end for hovedlinser.
source: The disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the focal complexity and number of lens elements required to achieve a range of focal lengths is much greater than for prime lenses.

reference: Dette bliver mindre problematisk, efterhånden som linseproducenterne får højere standarder i produktionen af linser.
source: This is becoming less of an issue as lens manufacturers achieve higher standards in lens production.

reference: Dette har gjort det muligt for zoomlinser at producere billeder af en kvalitet, der er sammenlignelig med den, der opnås ved linser, der har en fast brændvidde.
source: This has allowed zoom lenses to produce pictures of a quality comparable to that achieved by lenses with fixed focal length.

reference: En anden ulempe ved zoomlinser er, at linsens maksimale blænding (hastighed) som regel er lavere.
source: Another disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the maximum aperture (the speed) of the lens is usually lower.

reference: Dette gør billige zoomlinser svære at bruge under svage lysforhold uden en blitz.
source: This makes inexpensive zoom lenses hard to use in low-light conditions without a flash.

reference: Et af de mest almindelige problemer, når man forsøger at konvertere en film til DVD-format, er overscanning.
source: One of the most common problems when trying to convert a movie to DVD format is the overscan.

reference: Hovedparten af fjernsyn er lavet på en måde, der fungerer for de fleste.
source: Most televisions are made in a way to please the general public.

reference: Af den grund var alt det, du så på TV, klippet i kanterne - toppen, bunden og siderne.
source: For that reason, everything you see on the TV had the borders cut, top, bottom and sides.

reference: Dette er lavet for at sikre, at billedet dækker hele skærmen. Det kaldes for overscan.
source: This is made to ensure that the image covers the whole screen. That is called overscan.

reference: Hvis du laver en DVD, vil dens kanter desværre også højst sandsynligt blive klippet af, og hvis videoen havde undertekster for tæt på bunden, ville de ikke kunne ses helt.
source: Unfortunately, when you make a DVD, it's borders will most likely be cut too, and if the video had subtitles too close to the bottom, they won't be fully shown.

reference: Den traditionelle borg fra middelalderen har længe inspireret forestillingsevnen, fremmane billeder af ridderturneringer, banketter og Arthur ridderlighed.
source: The traditional medieval castle has long inspired the imagination, conjuring up images of jousts, banquets and Arthurian chivalry.

reference: Selv når man står midt i tusind år gamle ruiner, er det nemt at tænke på lydene og lugtene fra slag, der fandt sted for længe siden, næsten at høre lydene fra hove på brostenene og lugte frygten, der kommer op fra fangehullerne.
source: Even standing amidst thousand year-old ruins it is easy to bring to mind the sounds and smells of battles long gone, to almost hear the clatter of hooves on the cobbles and to smell the fear rising from the dungeon pits.

reference: Men er vores fantasi baseret på virkeligheden? Hvorfor blev slotte bygget til at starte med? Hvordan blev de designet og bygget?
source: But is our imagination based on reality? Why were castles built in the first place? How were they designed and built?

reference: Kirby Muxloe Castle er typisk for tidsperioden, da det er mere lignende et befæstet hus end det er et rigtigt slot.
source: Typical for the period, Kirby Muxloe Castle is more of a fortified house than a true castle.

reference: Dens store glasvinduer og tynde vægge ville ikke have kunnet modstå et målrettet angreb længe.
source: Its large glazed windows and thin walls would not have been able to resist a determined attack for long.

reference: I 1480'erne, da opbygningen blev påbegyndt af Lord Hastings, var landet relativt fredeligt, og der var kun behov for at forsvare sig mod små strejfende røverbander.
source: In the 1480s, when its construction was begun by Lord Hastings, the country was relatively peaceful and defense was only required against small bands of roving marauders.

reference: De europæiske nationer forsøgte at bibeholde den nationale suverænitet for alle europæiske stater ved hjælp af et magtbalancesystem.
source: The balance of power was a system in which European nations sought to maintain the national sovereignty of all European states.

reference: Konceptet var, at alle europæiske nationer skulle forsøge at forhindre en enkelt nation i at blive stærk, og således ændrede nationale regeringer ofte deres alliancer for at opretholde balancen.
source: The concept was that all European nations had to seek to prevent one nation from becoming powerful, and thus national governments often changed their alliances in order to maintain the balance.

reference: Den Spanske Arvefølgekrig var den første krig, hvis centrale punkt var magtbalancen.
source: The War of Spanish Succession marked the first war whose central issue was the balance of power.

reference: Dette markerede en vigtig ændring, da europæiske magter ikke længere ville have det påskud, at det var religiøse krige. Derfor var Trediveårskrigen den sidste krig, der blev betegnet som en religiøs krig.
source: This marked an important change, as European powers would no longer have the pretext of being religious wars. Thus, the Thirty Years' War would be the last war to be labeled a religious war.

topic: seven wonders of the world/temple of artemis
reference: Artemis' tempel i Efesus blev ødelagt den 21. juli 356 f.Kr. i en brand påsat af Herostratus.
source: The temple of Artemis at Ephesus was destroyed on July 21, 356 BCE in an act of arson committed by Herostratus.

topic: seven wonders of the world/temple of artemis
reference: Ifølge historien, var hans motivation berømmelse for enhver pris. Efeserne bekendtgjorde rasende at Herostratus' navn aldrig skulle registreres.
source: According to the story, his motivation was fame at any cost. The Ephesians, outraged, announced that Herostratus' name never be recorded.

topic: seven wonders of the world/temple of artemis
reference: Den græske historiker Strabo nedskrev senere navnet, hvilket er grunden til at vi kender det i dag. Templet blev ødelagt samme nat som Alexander Den Store blev født.
source: The Greek historian Strabo later noted the name, which is how we know today. The temple was destroyed on the same night that Alexander the Great was born.
