topic: seven wonders of the world/temple of artemis
reference: Som konge tilbød Alexander ham at betale for templets genopbygning, men hans tilbud blev afslået. Senere, efter Alexanders død, blev templet genopbygget i år 323 f.Kr.
source: Alexander, as king, offered to pay to rebuild the temple, but his offer was denied. Later, after Alexander died, the temple was rebuilt in 323 BCE.

reference: Sørg for at din hånd er så afslappet som muligt, mens du stadig rammer alle tonerne korrekt - prøv også at undgå at lave for mange ekstra bevægelser med fingrene.
source: Make sure your hand is as relaxed as possible while still hitting all the notes correctly - also try not to make much extraneous motion with your fingers.

reference: På denne måde udmatter du dig selv så lidt som muligt. Husk at der ingen grund er til at ramme tangenterne hårdt for at få mere lyd ligesom på klaveret.
source: This way, you will tire yourself out as little as possible. Remember there's no need to hit the keys with a lot of force for extra volume like on the piano.

reference: For at få ekstra lydstyrke på harmonika bruger man blæsebælgene med højere tryk eller hastighed.
source: On the accordion, to get extra volume, you use the bellows with more pressure or speed.

reference: Mystik er forfølgelsen af fællesskab med, identitet med eller bevidsthed om en ultimativ virkelighed, guddommelighed, åndelig sandhed eller Gud.
source: Mysticism is the pursuit of communion with, identity with, or conscious awareness of an ultimate reality, divinity, spiritual truth, or God.

reference: Den troende søger en direkte oplevelse, intuition, eller indsigt i guddommelig virkelighed/guddommen eller guderne.
source: The believer seeks a direct experience, intuition, or insight into divine reality/the deity or dieties.

reference: Følgere stræber efter bestemte måder at leve på og praksisser, der har til formål at nære de oplevelser.
source: Followers pursue certain ways of living, or practices that are intended to nurture those experiences.

reference: Mystik kan skelnes fra andre former for religiøs tro og tilbedelse ved, at den lægger vægt på den direkte personlige oplevelse af en unik bevidsthedstilstand især dem med en fredelig, indsigtsfuld, lykkelig eller endda ekstatisk karakter.
source: Mysticism can be distinguished from other forms of religious belief and worship by its emphasis on the direct personal experience of a unique state of consciousness, particularly those of a peaceful, insightful, blissful, or even ecstatic character.

reference: Sikhisme er en religion, som stammer fra det indiske subkontinent. Den opstod i Punjab-regionen i det 15. århundrede som følge af en sekterisk splittelse i hindutraditionen.
source: Sikhism is a religion from the Indian sub-continent. It originated in the Punjab region during the 15th century from a sectarian split within the Hindu tradition.

reference: Sikher ser deres tro som en religion, der er anderledes end hinduismen, selvom de anerkender dens hinduistiske rødder og traditioner.
source: Sikhs consider their faith to be a separate religion from Hinduism though they acknowledge its Hindu roots and traditions.

reference: Sikher kalder deres religion for Gurmat, som på punjabi betyder "guruens vej". Guruen er et grundlæggende element i alle indiske religioner, men er i sikhisme blevet tillagt en betydning som danner grundstenen i sikhernes tro.
source: Sikhs call their religion Gurmat, which is Punjabi for "way of the guru". The guru is a fundamental aspect of all Indian religions but in Sikhism has taken on an importance that forms the core of Sikh beliefs.

reference: Religionen blev grundlagt i det 15. århundrede af Guru Nanak (1469–1539). Han blev efterfulgt af yderligere ni guruer i træk.
source: The religion was founded in the 15th century by Guru Nanak (1469–1539). There followed in succession a further nine gurus.

reference: I juni 1956 blev Krushchevs løfter dog sat på prøve, da optøjer i Polen, hvor arbejdernes protester over mangel på mad og nedskæringer i løn, blev til en generel protest mod kommunismen.
source: However, in June 1956, Krushchev's promises were put to the test when riots in Poland, where workers were protesting against food shortages and wage cuts, turned into a general protest against Communism.

reference: Selvom Khrusjtjov i sidste ende sendte kampvogne ind for at genoprette orden, imødekom han visse økonomiske krav og gik med til at udpege den populære Wladyslaw Gomulka til ny premierminister.
source: Although in the end, Krushchev sent in tanks to restore order, he did give way to some economic demands and agreed to appoint the popular Wladyslaw Gomulka as the new prime minister.

reference: Det nordvestlige indiske subkontinent, hvor Induskulturen var en udbredt civilisation i bronzealderen. omfattede det meste af vore dages Pakistan samt regioner i nordvest Indien og nordøst Afghanistan,
source: The Indus Valley Civilization was a Bronze Age civilisation in the northwest Indian subcontinent encompassing most of modern-day Pakistan and some regions in northwest India and northeast Afghanistan.

reference: Civilisationen blomstrede i Indus-flodens bassiner, og det er herfra, den har fået sit navn.
source: The civilisation flourished in the basins of the Indus River wherefore it derives its name.

reference: Mens nogle forskere foreslår, at civilisationen, da den også eksisterede i den nu udtørrede Sarasvati-flods områder, burde kaldes Indus-Sarasvati-civilisationen, kalder andre den for Harappa-civilisationen efter Harappa, det første af dens udgravningssteder, der blev udgravet i 1920'erne.
source: Although some scholars speculate that since the civilisation also existed in the basins of the now dried up Sarasvati River, it should be aptly called the Indus-Sarasvati Civilization, while some call it the Harappan Civilization after Harappa, the first of its sites to be excavated in the 1920s.

reference: Romerrigets militaristiske tendenser fremmede udviklingen af medicinske fremskridt.
source: The militaristic nature of the Roman empire aided in the development of medical advances.

reference: Kejser Augustus begyndte at rekruttere læger, og lavede endda det første romerske lægekorps, der skulle bruges i kølvandet på slagene.
source: Doctors began to be recruited by Emperor Augustus and even formed the first Roman Medical Corps for use in the aftermath of battles.

reference: Kirurger kendte til forskellige former for bedøvelse såsom morfin fra valmuefrøekstrakt og skopolamin fra bulmeurt.
source: Surgeons had knowledge of various sedatives including morphine from extracts of poppy seeds and scopolamine from herbane seeds.

reference: De blev dygtige til at amputere for at redde patienter fra koldbrand og til at bruge årepressere og arterieklemmer til at reducere blodgennemstrømningen.
source: They became proficient at amputation to save patients from gangrene as well as tourniquets and arterial clamps to stem blood flow.

reference: Gennem flere århundreder førte Romerriget til store fremskridt inden for medicin og dannede meget af den viden, vi kender i dag.
source: Over multiple centuries, the Roman empire led to great gains in the field of medicine and formed much of the knowledge we know today.

reference: Pureland-origami er origami med de begrænsninger, at kun én fold må laves ad gangen, at mere komplekse folder såsom omvendte folder ikke er tilladte, og at alle folder skal have enkle placeringer.
source: Pureland origami is origami with the restriction that only one fold may be done at a time, more complex folds like reverse folds are not allowed, and all folds have straightforward locations.

reference: Det blev udviklet af John Smith i 1970'erne til at hjælpe uerfarne foldere eller dem med begrænsede motoriske færdigheder.
source: It was developed by John Smith in the 1970s to help inexperienced folders or those with limited motor skills.

reference: Børn udvikler bevidsthed om race og racestereotyper når de er ganske unge, og disse racestereotyper påvirker deres adfærd.
source: Children develop an awareness of race and racial stereotypes quite young and these racial stereotypes affect behavior.

reference: For eksempel vil børn, der identificeres med en raceminoritet, der stereotypt opfattes som klarende sig dårligt i skolen, klarer sig dårligt i skolen, når de lærer om den stereotyp, der er associeret med deres race.
source: For instance, children who identify with a racial minority that is stereotyped as not doing well in school tend to not do well in school once they learn about the stereotype associated with their race.

reference: MySpace er den tredje mest populære webside i USA og har i øjeblikket 54 millioner profiler.
source: MySpace is the third most popular website used in the United States and has 54 million profiles currently.

reference: Disse hjemmesider har fået meget opmærksomhed, særligt inden for uddannelse.
source: These websites have gotten a lot of attention, especially in the education setting.

reference: Der er positive aspekter ved disse websteder, som omfatter nemt at kunne sætte en klasseside op, som kan inkludere blogge, videoer, billeder og andre funktioner.
source: There are positive aspects to these websites, which include, being able to easily setup a class page which can include blogs, videos, photos, and other features.

reference: Man kan skabe nem adgang til denne side ved blot at oplyse én internetadresse, som er nem at huske og nem at taste ind for elever som måske har svært ved at bruge tastaturet eller at stave.
source: This page can easily be accessed by providing just one web address, which makes it easy to remember and easy to type in for students who may have trouble using the keyboard or with spelling.

reference: Det kan tilpasses, så det er nemt at læse, og der kan anvendes så lidt eller meget farve, som man ønsker.
source: It can be customized to make it easy to read and also with as much or little color as desired.

reference: Attention Deficit Disorder "er et neurologisk syndrom, hvis klassiske triade af definerende symptomer inkluderer impulsivitet, distraherbarhed og hyperaktivitet eller overskydende energi".
source: Attention Deficit Disorder "is a neurological syndrome whose classic defining triad of symptoms including impulsivity, distractibility, and hyperactivity or excess energy".

reference: Det drejer sig ikke om indlæringsvanskeligheder, men om indlæringsforstyrrelser og "rammer fra 3 til 5 procent af samtlige børn og måske helt op til 2 millioner børn i USA".
source: It is not a learning disability, it is a learning disorder; it "affects 3 to 5 percent of all children, perhaps as many as 2 million American children".

reference: Børn med ADD har svært ved at fokusere på ting som skolearbejde, men de kan godt koncentrere sig om ting de godt kan lide såsom at spille spil, se deres yndlingstegneserier eller skrive sætninger uden tegnsætning.
source: Children with ADD have a hard time focusing on things like school work, but they can concentrate on things they enjoy doing like playing games or watching their favorite cartoons or writing sentences without punctuation.

reference: Disse børn har tendens til at rende ind i en masse problemer, da de "engagerer sig i risikabel adfærd, kommer i slagsmål, og udfordrer autoriteter" for at stimulere deres hjerne, da deres hjerne ikke bliver stimuleret på normal vis.
source: These children tend to get into a lot of trouble, because they "engage in risky behaviors, get into fights, and challenge authority" in order to stimulate their brain, since their brain can not be stimulated by normal methods.

reference: ADD påvirker forhold til andre jævnaldrende, da de andre børn ikke kan forstå, hvorfor de opfører sig, som de gør, eller hvorfor de staver, som de gør, eller at deres modenhed er på et andet niveau.
source: ADD affects relationships with other peers because other children can not understand why they act the way that they do or why they spell they way they do or that their maturity level is different.

reference: I takt med at muligheden for at opnå viden og lære ændrede sig som beskrevet herover, ændrede folks læringshastigheder sig.
source: As the ability to obtain knowledge and to learn changed in such a way as mentioned above the base rate at which knowledge was obtained changed.

reference: Tilgangen til at skaffe information var anderledes. Der var ikke længere pres på med hensyn til  individuelle erindringer, men evnen til at huske tekster kom mere i fokus.
source: The approach to obtaining information was different. No longer did pressure reside within individual recall, but the ability to recall text became more of a focus.

reference: Kort sagt udgjorde Renæssancen en betydelig forandring i tilgangen til at lære og formidlingen af viden.
source: In essence, the Renaissance made a significant change in the approach to learning and the dissemination of knowledge.

reference: I modsætning til andre primater, bruger hominider ikke længere deres hænder i bevægelse til at bære vægt eller til at svinge sig gennem træerne.
source: Unlike other primates, hominids no longer use their hands in locomotion or bearing weight or swinging through the trees.

reference: Chimpansens hænder og fødder har samme størrelse og længde, hvilket afspejler at hånden bruges til at bære vægt, når den går knogang.
source: The chimpanzee's hand and foot are similar in size and length, reflecting the hand's use for bearing weight in knuckle walking.

reference: Den menneskelige hånd er kortere end foden og har mere lige falanger.
source: The human hand is shorter than the foot, with straighter phalanges.

reference: To til tre millioner år gamle fossiler af hænder viser dette skift i håndens udvikling fra bevægelse til manipulation.
source: Fossil hand bones two million to three million years old reveal this shift in specialization of the hand from locomotion to manipulation.

reference: Nogle mennesker synes, at det kan være meget udmattende, når de oplever mange kunstigt fremkaldte lucide drømme.
source: Some people believe that experiencing many artificially induced lucid dreams often enough can be very exhausting.

reference: Den primære årsag til dette fænomen er, at resultatet af klardrømmene forlænger tidsrummet mellem REM-faser.
source: The main reason for this phenomenon is the result of the lucid dreams expanding the length of time between REM states.

reference: Med færre REM'er pr. nat, bliver denne tilstand, hvori du faktisk sover og din krop genoprettes, sjældent nok til at blive et problem.
source: With fewer REMs per night, this state in which you experience actual sleep and your body recovers becomes infrequent enough to become a problem.

reference: Det er lige så udmattende, som hvis du vågnede hver tyvende eller tredivte minut og så fjernsyn.
source: This is just as exhausting as if you were to wake up every twenty or thirty minutes and watch TV.

reference: Effekten afhænger af, hvor ofte din hjerne forsøger at drømme lucide drømme om natten.
source: The effect is dependent on how often your brain attempts to lucidly dream per night.

reference: Italienerne havde problemer i Nordafrika næsten fra starten. Inden for en uge efter, at Italien havde erklæret krig d. 10. juni 1940, havde Storbritanniens 11. husarer overtaget Fort Capuzzo i Libyen.
source: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya.

reference: I et bagholdsangreb øst for Bardia tog briterne General Lastucci til fange. Han var den italienske tiende hærs ingeniør-general.
source: In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci.

reference: Den 28. juni blev marskal Italo Balbo, generalguvernør af Libyen og tilsyneladende Mussolinis efterfølger, dræbt ved egenbeskydning under landing i Tobruk.
source: On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

reference: Fægtning som moderne sport udøves på mange niveauer af studerende på universiteter til professionelle og olympiske turneringer.
source: The modern sport of fencing is played at many levels, from students learning at a university to professional and Olympic competition.

reference: Sporten bliver primært spillet i duelformat, hvor en fægter duellerer med en anden.
source: The sport is primarily played in a duel format, one fencer dueling another.

reference: Golf er et spil, hvor spillere bruger køller til at slå bolde i huller.
source: Golf is a game in which players use clubs to hit balls into holes.

reference: Der spilles atten huller under en almindelig runde, hvor spillere normalt begynder på det første hul på banen og slutter på det attende.
source: Eighteen holes are played during a regular round, with players usually starting on the first hole on the course and finishing on the eighteenth.

reference: Den spiller, der bruger færrest slag eller sving med køllen for at fuldføre banen, vinder.
source: The player who takes the fewest strokes, or swings of the club, to complete the course wins.

reference: Spillet bliver spillet på græs, og græsset omkring hullet bliver slået en smule kortere og kaldes "the green".
source: The game is played on grass, and the grass around the hole is mown shorter and called the green.

reference: Den mest almindelige type af turisme er nok den, de fleste folk forbinder med rejse: Fritidsturisme.
source: Perhaps the most common type of tourism is what most people associate with traveling: Recreation tourism.

reference: Det er, når folk tager et sted hen, der er meget forskelligt fra deres almindelige hverdagsliv for at slappe af og have det sjovt.
source: This is when people go to a place that is very different from their regular day-to-day life to relax and have fun.

reference: Strande, forlystelsesparker og lejrpladser er ofte de mest besøgte steder af ferieturister.
source: Beaches, theme parks and camp grounds are often the most common places frequented by recreational tourists.

reference: Hvis formålet med ens besøg til et bestemt sted er at lære om dets historie eller kultur, kaldes det kulturturisme.
source: If the objective of one’s visit to a particular place is to get to know its history and culture then this type of tourism is known as cultural tourism.

reference: Turister kan besøge forskellige vartegn i et bestemt land, eller de kan vælge at fokusere på bare et enkelt område.
source: Tourists may visit different landmarks of a particular country or they may simply opt to focus on just one area.

reference: Efter at have set denne aktivitet, kaldte kolonisterne også efter forstærkninger.
source: The Colonists, seeing this activity, had also called for reinforcements.

reference: De tropper, der styrkede de forreste positioner, bestod af de to 200 mand store 1. og 3. New Hampshire-regimenter, der blev ledet af obersterne John Stark og James Reed (der efterfølgende blev udnævnt til generaler).
source: Troops reinforcing the forward positions included the 1st and 3rd New Hampshire regiments of 200 men, under Colonels John Stark and James Reed (both later became generals).

reference: Starks mænd positionerede sig langs hegnet i den nordlige ende af kolonisternes position.
source: Stark's men took positions along the fence on the north end of the Colonist's position.

reference: Da lavvande åbnede et hul langs Mystic River langs den nordøstlige del af halvøen, forlængede de hurtigt hegnet med en kort stenmur mod nord, der sluttede ved vandkanten på en lille strand.
source: When low tide opened a gap along the Mystic River along the northeast of the peninsula, they quickly extended the fence with a short stone wall to the north ending at the water's edge on a small beach.

reference: Gridley eller Stark satte en pæl omkring 100 fod (30 m) foran hegnet og gav ordrer om, at ingen måtte skyde før soldaterne passerede den.
source: Gridley or Stark placed a stake about 100 feet (30 m) in front of the fence and ordered that no one fire until the regulars passed it.

reference: Den amerikanske plan var afhængig af, at koordinerede angreb fra tre forskellige retninger blev affyret.
source: The American plan relied on launching coordinated attacks from three different directions.

reference: General John Cadwalder lancerede et afledningsangreb mod den britiske garnison i Bordentown for at blokere for enhver forstærkning.
source: General John Cadwalder would launch a diversionary attack against the British garrison at Bordentown, in order to block off any reinforcements.

reference: General James Ewing ville tage 700 mænd over floden ved Trenton Ferry, overtage broen over Assunpink Creek og forhindre fjendtlige tropper i at flygte.
source: General James Ewing would take 700 militia across the river at Trenton Ferry, seize the bridge over the Assunpink Creek and prevent any enemy troops from escaping.

reference: Den primære angrebsstyrke på 2.400 mænd skulle krydse floden ni mil nord for Trenton og derefter dele sig i to grupper, en under Greene og en under Sullivan, for at starte et angreb ved daggry.
source: The main assault force of 2,400 men would cross the river nine miles north of Trenton, and then split into two groups, one under Greene and one under Sullivan, in order to launch a pre-dawn attack.

reference: Med ændringen af løbet fra en kvart til en halv mil, bliver løberens hastighed langt mindre vigtig, imens at udholdenhed bliver en absolut nødvendighed.
source: With the change from the quarter to the half mile run, speed becomes of much less importance and endurance becomes an absolute necessity.

reference: Naturligvis skal en førsteklasses half-miler, en person, der kan slå to minutter, basere sit løb på hastighed, men udholdenhed er dog også en vigtig faktor.
source: Of course a first-class half-miler, a man who can beat two minutes, must be possessed of a fair amount of speed, but endurance must be cultivated at all hazards.

reference: Noget langrendsløb i løbet af vinteren kombineret med gymnastikarbejde for den øverste del af kroppen er den bedste forberedelse til løbesæsonen.
source: Some cross country running during the winter, combined with gymnasium work for the upper part of the body, is the best preparation for the running season.

reference: Gode ernæringsvaner alene kan ikke skabe præstationer i eliteklasse, men de kan påvirke unge atleters generelle velbefindende betydeligt.
source: Proper nutritional practices alone cannot generate elite performances, but they can significantly affect young athletes' overall wellness.

reference: At vedligeholde en sund energibalance, at drikke rigeligt og at forstå meningen med tage tilskud kan forbedre atleters præstationer og give dem en bedre nydelse, når de dyrker sport.
source: Maintaining a healthy energy balance, practicing effective hydration habits, and understanding the various aspects of supplementation practices can help athletes improve their performance and increase their enjoyment of the sport.

reference: Mellemdistanceløb er en relativt billig sport; dog er der mange misforståelser med hensyn til de få dele, der kræves som udstyr for at deltage.
source: Middle distance running is a relatively inexpensive sport; however, there are many misconceptions regarding the few pieces of equipment required to participate.

reference: Man kan købe produkter efter behov, men de fleste vil have lille eller ingen nævneværdig effekt på ens præstationer.
source: Products can be purchased as needed, but most will have little or no real impact on performance.

reference: Sportsudøvere kan føle at de foretrækker et produkt, selvom det ikke har nogen egentlige fordele.
source: Athletes may feel that they prefer a product even when it provides no real benefits.

reference: Atomet kan betragtes som værende en af de fundamentale byggesten for al materie.
source: The atom can be considered to be one of the fundamental building blocks of all matter.

reference: Enheden er meget kompleks enhed og består af en central kerne omkring hvilken, der kredser elektroner, på cirka samme som de planeter, der kredser om solen, jf. en forenklet Bohr-model – se figur 1.1.
source: Its a very complex entity which consists, according to a simplified Bohr model, of a central nucleus orbited by electrons, somewhat similar to planets orbiting the sun - see Figure 1.1.

reference: Kernen består af to partikler - neutroner og protoner.
source: The nucleus consists of two particles - neutrons and protons.

reference: Protoner har positiv elektrisk ladning, mens neutroner ikke har nogen ladning. Elektroner har negativ elektrisk ladning.
source: Protons have a positive electric charge while neutrons have no charge. The electrons have a negative electric charge.

reference: For at tjekke offeret, skal du først undersøge området for at sikre din egen sikkerhed.
source: To Check the victim, you must first survey the scene to ensure your safety.

reference: Du skal lægge mærke til ofrets stilling, når du kommer tættere på ham eller hende, og se efter automatiske advarselstegn.
source: You need to notice the victim's position as you approach him or her and any automatic red flags.

reference: Hvis du kommer til skade, mens du forsøger at hjælpe, gør du måske kun situationen værre.
source: If you get hurt trying to help, you may only serve to make matters worse.

reference: Undersøgelsen viste at depression, frygt og katastrofering medierede forholdet mellem smerte og handicap hos personer med smerter i lænden.
source: The study found that depression, fear and catastrophising mediated the relationship between pain and disability in lower back pain sufferers.

reference: Kun effekter af katastrofetanker, ikke depression eller frygt, var betinget af ugentlige, strukturerede møder med en lægeassistent.
source: Only the effects of catastrophizing, not depression and fear was conditional of regular weekly structured PA sessions.

reference: De, der deltog i regelmæssig aktivitet, krævede mere støtte i form af negativ opfattelse af smerte, hvilket viser forskellene i kronisk smerte og følelsen af ubehag fra normal fysisk bevægelse.
source: Those participating in regular activity required more support in terms of negative perception of pain distinguishing the differences of chronic pain and discomfort feel from normal physical movement.

reference: Syn, eller evnen til at se, afhænger af sanseorganer til synssystemet eller øjne.
source: Vision, or the ability to see depends on visual system sensory organs or eyes.

reference: Der findes mange forskellige konstruktioner af øjne, som har forskellig kompleksitet afhængigt af organismens krav.
source: There are many different constructions of eyes, ranging in complexity depending on the requirements of the organism.

reference: De forskellige opbygninger har forskellige kapaciteter, er følsomme over for forskellige bølgelængder og har forskellige grader af skarphed, de kræver også forskellige behandlinger for at input og forskellige tal giver mening, og det hele fungerer optimalt.
source: The different constructions have different capabilities, are sensitive to different wave-lengths and have differing degrees of acuity, also they require different processing to make sense of the input and different numbers to work optimally.

reference: En bestand er en samling af organismer af en bestemt art inden for et bestemt geografisk område.
source: A population is the collection of organisms of a particular species within a given geographic area.

reference: Når et lands befolkning har fælles fænotypiske træk, kaldes de monomorfe.
source: When all individuals in a population are identical with regard to a particular phenotypic trait they are known as monomorphic.

reference: Når individerne viser flere varianter af et bestemt træk, er de polymorfe.
source: When the individuals show several variants of a particular trait they are polymorphic.

reference: Også kolonier af vandremyrer marcherer og bygger rede i forskellige faser.
source: Army ant colonies march and nest in different phases as well.

reference: I nomadefasen marcherer hærmyrer om natten og stopper for at slå lejr om dagen.
source: In the nomadic phase, army ants march at night and stop to camp during the day.

reference: Kolonien begynder en nomadisk fase, når der ikke lægere er føde i området. I denne fase laver kolonien midlertidige reder, der bliver ændret hver dag.
source: The colony begins a nomadic phase when available food has decreased. During this phase, the colony makes temporary nests that are changed everyday.

reference: Hver af disse nomadiske hærgninger eller marcher varer i cirka 17 dage.
source: Each of these nomadic rampages or marches lasts for approximately 17 days.

reference: Hvad er en celle? Ordet celle stammer fra det latinske ord "cella", hvilket betyder "lille rum", og det blev brugt for første gang af en mikroskopist, der observerede korkens struktur.
source: What is a cell? The word cell comes from the Latin word "cella", meaning "small room", and it was first coined by a microscopist observing the structure of cork.

reference: Cellen er den grundlæggende enhed for alle levende ting, og alle organismer består af en eller flere celler.
source: The cell is the basic unit of all living things, and all organisms are composed of one or more cells.

reference: Celler er rent faktisk så basale og kritiske for at studere liv, at de tit omtales som "livets byggesten".
source: Cells are so basic and critical to the study of life, in fact, that they are often referred to as "the building blocks of life".

reference: Nervesystemet vedligeholder homeostase ved at sende nerveimpulser igennem hele kroppen, for at kunne holde blodgennemstrømningen i gang, såvel som for at holde den uforstyrret.
source: The Nervous System maintains homeostasis by sending nerve impulses through out the body to keep the flow of blood going as well as undisturbed.

reference: Disse nerveimpulser kan blive sendt hurtigt rundt i hele kroppen, hvilket hjælper med at holde kroppen sikker fra enhver potentiel trussel.
source: These nerve impulses can be sent so quickly throughout the body which helps keep the body safe from any potential threat.

reference: Sammenlignet med andre voldsomme storme, rammer tornadoer kun et lille område, men de kan til gengæld ødelægge alt på deres vej.
source: Tornadoes strike a small area compared to other violent storms, but they can destroy everything in their path.

reference: Tornadoer river træer ud med deres rødder, river brædder af bygninger og kaster biler op i luften. De mest voldsomme to procent af tornadoer varer mere end tre timer.
source: Tornadoes uproot trees, rip boards from buildings, and fling cars up into the sky. The most violent two percent of tornadoes last more than three hours.

reference: Disse monsterstorme har vinde op til 480 km/t (133 m/s; 300 mil i timen).
source: These monster storms have winds up to 480 km/h (133 m/s; 300 mph).

reference: Mennesket har fremstillet og anvendt linser til forstørrelse i tusindvis af år.
source: Humans have been making and using lenses for magnification for thousands and thousands of years.

reference: De første rigtige teleskoper blev dog fremstillet i Europa i slutningen af det 16. århundrede.
source: However, the first true telescopes were made in Europe in the late 16th century.

reference: Disse teleskoper brugte en kombination af to linser til at få fjerne objekter til både at fremstå større og tættere på.
source: These telescopes used a combination of two lenses to make distant objects appear both nearer and larger.

reference: Grådighed og egoisme vil altid findes, og det er en del af den måde samarbejde fungerer på, at når flertallet har overtaget, vil det altid være muligt at vinde mere på kort sigt ved at handle egoistisk.
source: Greed and selfishness will always be with us and it is the nature of cooperation that when the majority benefit there will always be more to gain in the short term by acting selfishly

reference: Forhåbentlig vil de fleste mennesker indse, at deres bedste mulighed på lang sigt er at samarbejde med andre.
source: Hopefully, most people will realise that their long term best option is to work together with others.

reference: Mange drømmer om dagen, hvor mennesker kan rejse til en anden stjerne og udforske andre verdener. Nogle spekulerer over, hvad der er derude, og nogle tror på, at rumvæsener eller andet liv måske lever på en anden planet.
source: Many people dream of the day when humans can travel to another star and explore other worlds, some people wonder what's out there some belive that aliens or other life may live on another plant.

reference: Men hvis dette nogensinde sker, vil det sandsynligvis ikke ske før om meget længe. Stjernerne er så spredte, at der er flere milliarder kilometer mellem stjerner som er "naboer".
source: But, if this ever does happen probably won't happen for a very long time. The stars are so spread out that there are trillions of miles between stars that are "neighbors".

reference: Vil dine oldebørn måske en dag stå i en fremmed verden og tænke på deres antikke forfædre?
source: Maybe one day, your great grandchildren will be standing atop an alien world wondering about their ancient ancestors?

reference: Dyr er lavet af mange celler. De spiser ting og fordøjer dem i deres kroppe. De fleste dyr kan bevæge sig.
source: Animals are made of many cells. They eat things and digest them inside. Most animals can move.

reference: Kun dyr har hjerner (selvom det ikke er alle dyr der har en; gopler har for eksempel ingen hjerne).
source: Only animals have brains (though not even all animals do; jellyfish, for example, do not have brains).

reference: Der findes dyr over hele verden. De graver i jorden, svømmer i havene og flyver i himlen.
source: Animals are found all over the earth. They dig in the ground, swim in the oceans, and fly in the sky.

reference: Celler er de mindste strukturelle og funktionelle enheder for en levende (ting) organisme.
source: A cell is the smallest structural and functional unit of a living (things) organism.

reference: Celle kommer fra det latinske ord cella, hvilket betyder lille rum.
source: Cell comes from the Latin word cella which means small room.

reference: Hvis du betragter levende ting under et mikroskop, vil du se, at de er dannet af små firkanter eller kugler.
source: If you look at living things under a microscope, you will see that they are made of small squares or balls.

reference: Den engelske biolog Robert Hooke så små firkanter i kork med et mikroskop.
source: Robert Hooke, a biologist from England, saw small squares in cork with a microscope.

reference: De havde en facon, som lignede rum. Han var den første, der var i stand til at observere døde celler.
source: They looked like rooms. He was the first person to observe dead cells

reference: Elementer og kemiske forbindelser kan gå fra en tilstand til en anden uden at ændre sig.
source: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change.

reference: Nitrogen i gasform har stadig samme egenskaber som flydende nitrogen. Den flydende form har højere massefylde, men molekylerne er stadig de samme.
source: Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same.

reference: Vand er et andet eksempel. Vand er sammensat af to hydrogenatomer og et oxygenatom.
source: Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom.

reference: Det har den samme molekylære struktur, uanset om det er gas, flydende eller fast.
source: It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid.

reference: Selvom dens fysiske tilstand kan ændre sig, forbliver dens kemiske tilstand den samme.
source: Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.

reference: Tid er noget, der er overalt, og den påvirker alt hvad vi gør, men den er svær at forstå.
source: Time is something that is all around us, and affects everything we do, yet is difficult to understand.

reference: Tid er blevet studeret af religiøse, filosofiske og videnskabelige forskere i tusindvis af år.
source: Time has been studied by religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars for thousands of years.

reference: Vi oplever tiden som en række begivenheder, der går fra fremtiden gennem nutiden til fortiden.
source: We experience time as a series of events passing from the future through the present to the past.

reference: Tid er også den måde, hvorpå vi sammenligner varigheden (længden) af begivenheder.
source: Time is also how we compare the duration (length) of events.

reference: Du kan selv markere tidens gang, ved at observere gentagelsen af en cyklisk begivenhed. En cyklisk begivenhed er noget der regelmæssigt sker igen og igen.
source: You can mark the passing of time yourself by observing the repetition of a cyclical event. A cyclical event is something that happens again and again regularly.

reference: Computere i dag bruges til at manipulere billeder og videoer.
source: Computers today are used to manipulate pictures and videos.

reference: Avancerede animationer kan skabes på computere, og den slags animationer bliver mere og mere udbredt inden for TV og film.
source: Sophisticated animations can be constructed on computers, and this kind of animation is increasingly being used in television and films.

reference: Musik bliver ofte optaget ved hjælp af sofistikerede computere, der kan behandle og mixe lyden.
source: Music is often recorded using sophisticated computers to process and mix sounds together.

reference: I en stor del af det nittende og tyvende århundrede mente man, at de første indbyggere i New Zealand var maori-folket som jagtede kæmpefugle kaldet moaer.
source: For a long time during the nineteenth and twentieth centuries, it was believed the first inhabitants of New Zealand were the Maori people, who hunted giant birds called moas.

reference: Teorien etablerede derefter ideen, at maorifolket indvandrede fra Polynesien i en stor flåde og tog New Zealand fra Moriorierne, og etablerede et landbrugssamfund.
source: The theory then established the idea that the Maori people migrated from Polynesia in a Great Fleet and took New Zealand from the Moriori, establishing an agricultural society.

reference: Nye beviser antyder dog, at moriorierne var en gruppe fastlandsmaorier, der migrerede fra New Zealand til Chatham-øerne og udviklede deres egen karakteristiske, fredelige kultur.
source: However, new evidence suggests that the Moriori were a group of mainland Maori who migrated from New Zealand to the Chatham Islands, developing their own distinctive, peaceful culture.

reference: Der var også en anden stamme på Chatham-øerne, disse var Maorier, der var migreret fra New Zealand.
source: There was also another tribe on the Chatham islands these were Maori who migrated away from New Zealand.

reference: De kaldte sig selv for moriorierne.Der var nogle få sammenstød og i sidste ende blev moriorierne udslettet
source: They called themselves the Moriori there were a few skirmishes and in the end, the Moriori were wiped out

reference: Personer, som havde været involveret i flere årtider, hjalp os med at påskønne vores styrker og lidenskaber og samtidig vurdere vores problemer og fejl oprigtigt.
source: Individuals who had been involved for several decades helped us appreciate our strengths and passions while candidly assessing difficulties and even failures.

reference: Mens vi lyttede til individer, som delte deres individuelle, familiemæssige og organisatoriske historier, fik vi et værdifuldt indsigt i fortiden samt nogle af de personligheder, der påvirkede organisationens kultur på en positiv eller negativ måde.
source: While listening to individuals share their individual, family, and organizational stories, we gained valuable insight into the past and some of the personalities who influenced for good or ill the culture of the organization.

reference: Mens forståelse af ens historie ikke forudsætter at man forstår kultur, hjælper det i det mindste folk med at få en fornemmelse af, hvor de falder ind under organisationens historie.
source: While understanding one’s history does not assume understanding of culture, it does at least help people gain a sense of where they fall within the history of the organization.

reference: Når individer vurderer succeserne og opdager fejl, får de samt alle de deltagende personer en bedre forståelse for organisationens værdier, mission og drivkræfter.
source: While assessing the successes and becoming aware of failures, individuals and the whole of the participating persons discover more deeply the values, mission, and driving forces of the organization.

reference: I dette tilfælde hjalp det folk med at være åbne over for nye ændringer og en ny retning for den lokale kirke at huske tilbage på tidligere tilfælde af iværksætteri og de succeser, det medførte.
source: In this instance, recalling previous instances of entrepreneurial behavior and resulting successes helped people to be open to new changes and new direction for the local church.

reference: Sådanne succeshistorier mindskede frygten for forandringer og skabte positive tilbøjeligheder mod forandring i fremtiden.
source: Such success stories lessened the fears of change, while creating positive inclinations toward change in the future.

reference: Konvergerende tankemønstre er problemløsningsteknikker, der samler forskellige idéer eller områder for at finde en løsning.
source: Convergent thinking patterns are problem solving techniques that unite different ideas or fields to find a solution.

reference: Fokus for denne tankegang er hastighed, logik og nøjagtighed, lige såvel som identifikation af fakta, genanvendelse af eksisterende teknikker, og indsamling af oplysninger.
source: The focus of this mindset is speed, logic and accuracy, also identification of facts, reapplying existing techniques, gathering information.

reference: Den vigtigste faktor i denne tankegang er: der er kun ét rigtigt svar. Man tænker kun på to svar, nemlig det rigtige eller det forkerte.
source: The most important factor of this mindset is: there is only one correct answer. You only think of two answers, namely right or wrong.

reference: Måden at tænke på forbindes med specifikke videnskabelige procedurer eller standardprocedurer.
source: This type of thinking is associated with certain science or standard procedures.

reference: Mennesker, der tænker  på denne måde, anvender logisk tænkning, og de er i stand til at huske mønstre, løse problemer og arbejde med videnskabelige tests.
source: People with this type of thinking have logical thinking, are able to memorize patterns, solve problems and work on scientific tests.

reference: Mennesket er langt den mest talentfulde art med hensyn til at læse andres tanker.
source: Humans are by far the most talented species in reading the minds of others.

reference: Dette betyder, at vi er i stand til korrekt at forudsige, hvad andre mennesker opfatter, planlægger, tror, ved eller ønsker.
source: That means we are able to successfully predict what other humans perceive, intend, believe, know or desire.

reference: Blandt disse færdigheder er evnen til at forstå andres intentioner afgørende. Den gør os i stand til at afklare eventuelle utydeligheder i fysiske handlinger.
source: Among these abilities, understanding the intention of others is crucial. It allows us to resolve possible ambiguities of physical actions.

reference: For eksempel ville du, hvis du så nogen smadre en bilrude, sandsynligvis antage at vedkommende var i gang med at stjæle en fremmed persons bil.
source: For example, if you were to see someone breaking a car window, you would probably assume he was trying to steal a stranger’s car.

reference: Det ville være nødvendigt at dømme ham anderledes, hvis han havde mistet sine bilnøgler og det var hans egen bil som han prøvede at bryde ind i.
source: He would need to be judged differently if he had lost his car keys and it was his own car that he was trying to break into.

reference: MR er baseret på et fysisk fænomen kaldet kernemagnetisk resonans (NMR), som blev opdaget i 1930'erne af Felix Bloch (ansat ved Stanford University) og Edward Purcell (fra Harvard University).
source: MRI is based on a physics phenomenon called nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), which was discovered in the 1930s by Felix Bloch (working at Stanford University) and Edward Purcell (from Harvard University).

reference: I denne resonans får magnetfeltet og radiobølgerne atomerne til at afgive små radiosignaler.
source: In this resonance, magnetic field and radio waves cause atoms to give off tiny radio signals.

reference: I år 1970 opdagede Raymond Damadian, en læge og forsker, grundlaget for at bruge billeddannelse med magnetisk resonans som et redskab til medicinske diagnoser.
source: In the year 1970, Raymond Damadian, a medical doctor and research scientist, discovered the basis for using magnetic resonance imaging as a tool for medical diagnosis.

reference: Fire år efter blev patentet godkendt, hvilket var verdens første godkendte patent inden for MRI.
source: Four years later a patent was granted, which was the world's first patent issued in the field of MRI.

reference: I 1977 færdiggjorde Dr. Damadian konstruktionen af den første "helkrops" MRI-scanner, som han kaldte den "Ukuelige".
source: In 1977, Dr. Damadian completed the construction of the first “whole-body” MRI scanner, which he called the ”Indomitable”.

reference: Asynkron kommunikation giver tid til at reflektere og reagere over for andre.
source: Asynchronous communication encourages time for reflection and reaction to others.

reference: Det giver studerende mulighed for at arbejde i deres eget tempo og styre, hvor hurtigt de modtager vejledende oplysninger.
source: It allows students the ability to work at their own pace and control the pace of instructional information.

reference: Der er desuden færre tidsbegrænsninger og gode muligheder for en fleksibel arbejdstid. (Bremer, 1998)
source: In addition, there are fewer time restrictions with the possibility of flexible working hours. (Bremer, 1998)

reference: Brugen af internettet og World Wide Web giver elever adgang til information på et hvilket som helst tidspunkt.
source: The use of the Internet and the World Wide Web allows learners to have access to information at all times.

reference: Studerende kan også indsende spørgsmål til instruktører på et hvilket som helst tidspunkt på dagen og forvente forholdsmæssigt hurtige svar, fremfor at vente til det næste fysiske møde.
source: Students can also submit questions to instructors at any time of day and expect reasonably quick responses, rather than waiting until the next face-to-face meeting.

reference: Den postmoderne tilgang til læring giver friheden fra absolutter. Der er ikke én bestemt god måde at lære på.
source: The postmodern approach to learning offers the freedom from absolutes. There is no one good way to learn.

reference: Faktisk er der ikke en eneste god ting at lære. Læring foregår i mødet mellem den lærende og den viden, der præsenteres.
source: In fact, there is not one good thing to learn.Learning takes place in the experience between the learner and the knowledge presented.

reference: Vores nuværende oplevelse med alle de gør-det-selv og informative, læringsbaserede tv-programmer illustrerer denne pointe.
source: Our current experience with all the do-it-yourself and information presenting, learning-based television shows illustrates this point.

reference: Så mange af os befinder os der, hvor vi ser et tv-show, som informerer os om en proces eller en oplevelse, som vi aldrig vil deltage i, og vi kommer heller ikke til at anvende den information, vi får.
source: So many of us find ourselves watching a television show that informs us of a process or experience in which we will never participate or apply that knowledge.

reference: Vi vil aldrig renovere en bil, bygge et springvand i vores baghave, rejse til Peru for at undersøge gamle ruiner eller ombygge vores nabos hus.
source: We will never overhaul a car, build a fountain in our backyard, travel to Peru to examine ancient ruins, or remodel our neighbour's house.

reference: Takket være undersøiske fiberoptiske kabelforbindelser til Europa samt satellitbaseret bredbånd er Grønland godt forbundet, og 93% af befolkningen har internetadgang.
source: Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access.

reference: Dit hotel eller dine værter (hvis du bor i et gæstehus eller privat hjem) vil sandsynligvis have wi-fi eller en computer med internetforbindelse, og alle byer har en internetcafé eller et sted med offentligt wi-fi.
source: Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi.

reference: Som nævnt herover anses ordet "Eskimo", selvom det stadig anses for acceptabelt i USA, for at være nedsættende for mange arktiske folk uden for USA - specielt i Canada.
source: As mentioned above, though the word "Eskimo" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada.

reference: Mens du måske hører det ord blive brugt af grønlandske indfødte, bør det ikke bruges af udlændinge.
source: While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners.

reference: De indfødte indbyggere i Grønland kalder sig inuitter i Canada, og i Grønland kalder de sig Kalaalleq (flertal: Kalaallit), som betyder "grønlænder".
source: The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland.

reference: Generelt er kriminalitet og had mod udlændinge næsten ukendt i Grønland. Selv i byerne er der ingen "farlige områder".
source: Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no "rough areas."

reference: Koldt vejr er måske den eneste rigtige fare, som den uforberedte vil stå over for.
source: Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face.

reference: Hvis du besøger Grønland i de kolde måneder (og medregn, at det bliver koldere og koldere, jo længere nordpå du tager), er det essentielt at medbringe tøj, der er varmt nok.
source: If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing.

reference: De meget lange dage om sommeren kan føre til problemer med at få nok søvn og medfølgende sundhedsproblemer.
source: The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues.

reference: Om sommeren bør du også holde øje med de nordiske myg. De giver dig ingen sygdomme, men de kan være irriterende.
source: During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating.

reference: San Franciscos økonomi er forbundet med at være en turistattraktion i verdensklasse, mens dens økonomi er diversificeret.
source: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified.

reference: De største beskæftigelsessektorer er professionelle tjenesteydelser, den offentlige sektor, finans, handel og turisme.
source: The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism.

reference: Det, at den ofte portrætteres i musik, film, litteratur og populærkultur, har været med til at gøre byen og dens vartegn kendt over hele verden.
source: Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world.

reference: San Francisco har udviklet en stor turistinfrastruktur med talrige hoteller, restauranter og de bedste konferencefaciliteter.
source: San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities.

reference: San Francisco er også et af de bedste steder i landet for anden asiatisk mad: koreansk, thai, indisk og japansk.
source: San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

reference: En rejse til Walt Disney World, er som en stor pilgrimsrejse for mange amerikanske familier.
source: Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families.

reference: Det "typiske" besøg består i at flyve til Orlandos internationale lufthavn, køre i en bus til et Disney-hotel på stedet, en uges ophold uden at forlade Disneys ejendom og en returrejse.
source: The "typical" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home.

reference: Der er et uendeligt antal mulige variationer, men dette er stadig, hvad de fleste mennesker mener, når de taler om "at tage til Disney World".
source: There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of "going to Disney World".

reference: Mange billetter, som sælges online på auktionssider såsom eBay eller Craigslist, er delvist brugte flerdages Park Hopper-billetter.
source: Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets.

reference: Selvom det er en meget almindelig aktivitet, er det ikke tilladt af Disney: billetterne kan ikke overdrages.
source: While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable.

reference: For at slå lejr i selve Grand Canyon kræves en vildmarkstilladelse.
source: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit.

reference: Tilladelser er begrænsede til at beskytte kløften og er tilgængelige fra den første dag i måneden, fire måneder før startmåneden.
source: Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month.

reference: Derfor bliver en backcountry-tilladelse for en hvilken som helst startdato i maj tilgængelig den 1. januar.
source: Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan.

reference: Pladser til de mest populære områder såsom Bright Angel Campground i nærheden af Phantom Ranch, fyldes generelt op via forespørgslerne der modtages på den første dato, de er åbne for reservationer.
source: Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations.

reference: Der er et begrænset antal tilladelser forbeholdt drop-in anmodninger, som er tilgængelige efter først-til-mølle-princippet.
source: There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

reference: At komme til det sydlige Afrika med bil er en fantastisk måde at se hele regionens skønhed på såvel som at finde steder udenfor de normale turistruter.
source: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes.

reference: Dette kan gøres i en normal bil med forsigtig planlægning, men en firhjulstrækker anbefales stærkt, og mange steder er kun tilgængelige med en firhjulstrækker med en høj hjulbase.
source: This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4.

reference: Husk, når du planlægger, at selvom Sydafrika er stabilt, så er det ikke alle nabolande, der er det.
source: Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are.

reference: Visumkrav og omkostninger varierer fra nation til nation og ændrer sig afhængigt af det land, du kommer fra.
source: Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from.

reference: Hvert land har også unikke love, der kræver forskellige genstande til nødsituationer, der skal være at finde i bilen.
source: Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

reference: Victoria Falls er en by i den vestlige del af Zimbabwe på den anden side af grænsen fra Livingstone, Zambia og tæt på Botswana.
source: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana.

reference: Byen ligger lige ved siden af vandfaldene, og de er hovedattraktionen, men denne populære turistdestination giver både eventyrsøgere og turister masser af muligheder for et længere ophold.
source: The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay.

reference: I regnsæsonen (november til marts) vil vandvolumen være større, og vandfaldene vil være mere dramatiske.
source: In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic.

reference: Du bliver helt sikkert våd, hvis du krydser broen, eller går langs stierne der snor sig omkring vandfaldene.
source: You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls.

reference: På den anden side er det netop fordi, mængden af vand er så stor, at din udsigt over de egentlige vandfald bliver sløret—af alt vandet!
source: On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

reference: Tutankhamuns grav (KV62). KV62 er muligvis den mest berømte af alle gravene i dalen, da den var stedet for Howard Carters opdagelse i 1922 af den næsten perfekte vedligeholdelse af den unge konges royale begravelse.
source: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king.

reference: Sammenlignet med de fleste andre regenters gravsteder er Tutankhamuns grav knap nok værd at besøge, da den er betydeligt mindre og med kun få dekorationer.
source: Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration.

reference: Er man interesseret i at se de skader, som blev påført mumien under forsøg på at fjerne den fra kisten, bliver man skuffet, da kun dens hoved og skuldre er synlige.
source: Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible.

reference: De fantastiske rigdomme fra graven findes ikke længere i den, men er blevet flyttet til det egyptiske museum i Kairo.
source: The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo.

reference: Det ville være bedst, hvis besøgende med begrænset tid brugte deres tid andre steder.
source: Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

reference: Phnom Krom, 12 km sydvest for Siem Reap. Dette tempel blev bygget på en bakketop i slutningen af det 9. århundrede under kong Yasovarmans regeringstid.
source: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman.

reference: Den dystre stemning i templet og udsigten over Tonle Sap-søen gør det værd at gennemføre klatringen til bakken.
source: The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile.

reference: Et besøg i området kan nemt kombineres med en bådtur til søen.
source: A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake.

reference: Angkor-passet er nødvendigt, for at få adgang til templet, så husk at tage dit pas med dig, når du rejser til Tonle Sap.
source: The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

reference: Jerusalem er hovedstaden og den største by i Israel, selvom de fleste andre lande og FN ikke anerkender den som Israels hovedstad.
source: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital.

reference: Den oldgamle by i det judæiske højland har en fascinerende historie, som går tusindvis af år tilbage i tiden.
source: The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years.

reference: Byen er hellig for de tre monoteistiske religioner - jødedommen, kristendommen og islam og fungerer som et åndeligt, religiøst og kulturelt center.
source: The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center.

reference: Grundet byens religiøse signifikans og i særdeleshed de adskillige attraktioner i Old City-området er Jerusalem et af de essentielle turistdestinationer i Israel.
source: Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel.

reference: Jerusalem har mange historiske, arkæologiske og kulturelle steder samt livlige og propfulde indkøbscentre, caféer og restauranter.
source: Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

reference: Ecuador kræver, at cubanske borgere modtager et invitationsbrev før indrejse til Ecuador via internationale lufthavne eller grænsepassager.
source: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points.

reference: Dette brev skal legaliseres af Ecuadors udenrigsministerium og opfylde visse krav.
source: This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements.

reference: Disse krav har til formål at sikre en organiseret indvandringsstrøm mellem de to lande.
source: These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries.

reference: Cubanske statsborgere, som har et amerikansk green card, bør tage til et ecuadoriansk konsulat for at skaffe en undtagelse fra kravet.
source: Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement.

reference: Dit pas skal være gyldigt i mindst 6 måneder efter datoen for din rejse. Du skal have en returbillet eller en billet til en videre rejse for at bevise længden af dit ophold.
source: Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

reference: Ture er billigere for større grupper, så hvis du er alene eller sammen med kun én ven, kan du prøve at mødes med andre mennesker og lave en gruppe på fire til seks personer, så i kan få en bedre pris pr. person.
source: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate.

reference: Dette bør dog ikke være noget du bekymrer dig om, da turister ofte bliver flyttet rundt for at fylde bilerne.
source: However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars.

reference: Det ser faktisk ud til i højere grad at være en måde at narre folk til at tro, at de skal betale mere.
source: It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

reference: Dette stejle bjerg hæver sig højt over den nordlige ende af Machu Picchu, og er ofte baggrund for mange billeder af ruinerne.
source: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins.

reference: Det ser lidt skræmmende ud nedenfra, og det er en stejl og vanskelig opstigning, men de fleste personer i rimelig form bør være i stand til at klare det på cirka 45 minutter.
source: It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes.

reference: Stentrin er lagt langs det meste af stien, og i de mere stejle sektioner udgør stålkabler et støttende gelænder.
source: Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail.

reference: Når det er sagt, bør du forvente at blive forpustet, og du bør være forsigtig på de stejlere dele af ruten, især i vådt vejr da det hurtigt kan blive farligt.
source: That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly.

reference: Der er en lille hule tæt på toppen, som man skal igennem, den er ret lav og snæver og svær at komme igennem
source: There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

reference: Det er bedst at se Galapagosøernes steder og dyreliv med båd, ligesom Charles Darwin gjorde det i 1835.
source: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835.

reference: Over 60 krydstogtsskibe sejler gennem Galapagos-farvandene - med størrelser fra 8 til 100 passagerer.
source: Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers.

reference: De fleste reserverer deres pladser i god tid (da bådene som regel er fyldt godt op i højsæsonen).
source: Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season).

reference: Sørg for at den agent som du booker igennem er specialist i Galapagos og har godt kendskab til mange forskellige typer skibe.
source: Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships.

reference: Dette vil sikre, at dine særlige interesser og/eller begrænsninger bliver matchet med det skib, der passer bedst til dem.
source: This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

reference: Før spanierne ankom i det 16. århundrede, var det nordlige Chile under inkaernes herredømme, mens de oprindelige araukanere (Mapuche) boede i det centrale og sydlige Chile.
source: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile.

reference: Mapuchefolket var også en af de sidste uafhængige amerikanske indfødte grupper, som ikke blev totalt integreret i det spansktalende styre, indtil efter Chile blev uafhængigt.
source: The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence.

reference: Selvom Chile erklærede sig uafhængigt i 1810 (midt i Napoleonskrigene som efterlod Spanien uden en fungerende centralregering i et par år), opnåede de først den afgørende sejr over spanierne i 1818.
source: Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

reference: Den Dominikanske Republik (spansk: República Dominicana) er et land i Caribien placeret på den østlige halvdel af øen Hispaniola, som den deler med Haiti.
source: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti

reference: Udover hvide sandstrande og bjerglandskaber er landet hjemsted for den ældste europæiske by i Amerika, som nu er en del af Santo Domingo.
source: Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo.

reference: Øen blev først beboet af Taínos- og Caribes-folkene. Cariberne var et Arawakan-talende folk, der var ankommet omkring 10.000 f.Kr.
source: The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE.

reference: Inden for få år efter ankomsten af de europæiske opdagelsesrejsende, var befolkningen i Tainos blevet reduceret betydeligt af de spanske erobrere
source: Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors

reference: Baseret på Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) dræbte de spanske erobrere omkring 100.000 taínoer mellem 1492 og 1498.
source: Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

reference: Jardín de la Unión. Dette område blev bygget som et atrium til et 17. århundredes kloster, hvor Templo de San Diego er den eneste overlevende bygning.
source: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building.

reference: Den fungerer nu som det centrale torv, og der sker altid en masse, dag og nat.
source: It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night.

reference: Der er flere restauranter, der omkranser haven, og om eftermiddagen og aftenen bliver der ofte givet gratis koncerter fra den centrale havepavillion.
source: There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo.

reference: Callejon del Beso (Kyssets Gyde). To altaner, udelukkende separeret af 69 cm., er hjemsted for en historisk kærlighedslegende.
source: Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend.

reference: Nogle børn vil fortælle dig historien for et par pennies.
source: For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

reference: Bowen Island er en populær destination for endagsture eller weekendudflugter, og byder på kajakroning, vandreture, butikker, restauranter og meget mere.
source: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more.

reference: Dette autentiske samfund ligger i Howe Sound lige uden for Vancouver, og der er nem adgang via planlagte vandtaxaer, der afgår fra Granville Island i centrum af Vancouver.
source: This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver.

reference: Til dem, der godt kan lide udendørsaktiviteter, er en tur op ad Sea to Sky-korridoren essentiel.
source: For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential.

reference: Whistler (1,5 times kørsel fra Vancouver) er dyrt, men kendt på grund af vinter-OL i 2010.
source: Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics.

reference: Om vinteren kan du prøve nogle af de bedste skiløb i Nordamerika, og om sommeren kan du prøve noget autentisk mountainbiking.
source: In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

reference: Tilladelser skal reserveres på forhånd. Du skal have en tilladelse for at kunne overnatte i Sirena.
source: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena.

reference: Sirena er den eneste ranger station, som tilbyder indkvartering i sovesale samt varme måltider foruden camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo og Los Patos tilbyder kun camping og ingen mad.
source: Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service.

reference: Det er muligt at købe parktilladelser på rangerstationen i Puerto Jiménez, men de modtager ikke kreditkort.
source: It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards

reference: Parktjenesten (MINAE) udsteder ikke parktilladelser mere end en måned før forventet ankomst.
source: The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival.

reference: CafeNet El Sol tilbyder en reservationstjeneste på 30$ eller 10$ for et endagspas; flere detaljer kan ses på deres Corcovado-side.
source: CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

reference: Cook-øerne er en østat i fri tilknytning til New Zealand, Øerne er beliggende i Polynesien, midt i det sydlige Stillehav.
source: The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean.

reference: Det er et øhav med 15 øer fordelt over 2,2 millioner km2 hav.
source: It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean.

reference: Da de er i samme tidszone som Hawaii, bliver øerne sommetider tænkt på som "Hawaii nedenfor".
source: With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as "Hawaii down under".

reference: Selvom de er mindre, minder de nogle ældre besøgende om Hawaii før det blev en stat, uden alle de store turisthoteller og anden udvikling.
source: Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development.

reference: Cook-øerne har ikke nogen byer, men er sammensat af 15 forskellige øer. Hovedøerne er Rarotonga og Aitutaki.
source: The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki.

reference: I nutidens udviklede lande er det at tilbyde luksussenge og morgenmad, blevet forhøjet til en slags kunstform.
source: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form.

reference: I den øverste ende konkurrerer Bed & Breakfasts naturligvis hovedsageligt på to områder: soveforhold og morgenmad.
source: At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast.

reference: Derfor kan man ofte i de fineste sådanne etablissementer, finde det mest luksuriøse sengetøj, måske et håndlavet quiltet tæppe eller en antik seng.
source: Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed.

reference: Morgenmaden kan omfatte sæsonbestemte lækkerier fra regionen eller værtens specialret.
source: Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish.

reference: Stedet kan være en gammel, historisk bygning med antikke møbler, en velplejet grund og en swimmingpool.
source: The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

reference: At sætte sig ind i sin egen bil og tage ud på en lang køretur er i sig selv en tiltalende idé, fordi det er så enkelt.
source: Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity.

reference: I modsætning til større køretøjer, så ved du sikkert allerede hvordan du skal køre din bil og du kender dens begrænsninger.
source: Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations.

reference: Opsætning af et telt på privat ejendomme eller i en by af en hvilken som helst størrelse kan nemt tiltrække uønsket opmærksomhed.
source: Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention.

reference: Kort sagt er brugen af din bil en god måde at tage en roadtrip på, men sjældent i sig selv en form for "camping".
source: In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to "camp".

reference: Bilcamping er muligt, hvis du har en stor minivan, SUV, sedan eller stationcar med sæder, der kan lægges ned.
source: Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down.

reference: Nogle hoteller har en arv fra dampjernbanernes og oceanskibenes guldalder: før Anden Verdenskrig, i det 19. eller starten af det 20. århundrede.
source: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries.

reference: Disse hoteller var der, hvor de rige og berømte fra den tid boede, og havde ofte fine spisesteder og natteliv.
source: These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife.

reference: De gammeldags beslag, manglen på de nyeste faciliteter og en vis yndefuld ældning er også en del af deres karakter.
source: The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character.

reference: Selvom de som regel er privatejede, indkvarterer de sommetider besøgende statsledere og andre højtstående embedsmænd.
source: While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries.

reference: En rejsende med masser af penge vil måske overveje at flyve verden rundt og opdele turen med ophold på mange af disse hoteller.
source: A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

reference: Et netværk til gæstfrihedsudveksling er en organisation, som forbinder rejsende og lokale beboere i de byer, de skal besøge.
source: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit.

reference: At tilmelde sig et sådant netværk kræver normalt blot at man udfylder en onlineformular; selvom nogle netværk tilbyder eller kræver yderligere bekræftelse.
source: Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification.

reference: En liste over tilgængelige værter leveres derefter, enten på tryk og/eller online, sommetider med referencer og anmeldelser fra andre rejsende.
source: A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers.

reference: Couchsurfing blev grundlagt i januar 2004, efter computerprogrammøren Casey Fenton fandt et billigt fly til Island men manglede et sted at overnatte.
source: Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay.
